original: skal ba dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gang zag de la mngag pa 'dra bas rab tu 'byin du 'jug ba gang yin pa de ni chog ma yin pa ma yin te cho ga yin pa kho nar blta bar bya'o //

translated: Here, the term higher refers to the vows of a novice nun, which are higher than the vows of a novice monk, since the latter are mentioned previously.

original: bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba dag go //
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba dag go //
translated: The higher ordination is the conferral of full ordination.

original: mi nod ni byin pa nyed ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi nod ni byin pa nyed ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one does not accept, it is not conferred.

original: bslab pa sbyin pa dang / bslab pa gsol ba dang / sdom pa sbyin pa dag la las byed pa na de dag 'di skad ces bdag la bslab bam sbyin cig bdag bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma byed cig ces mi nod na sbyin par byed du zin kyang byin pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bslab pa sbyin pa dang / bslab pa gsol ba dang / sdom pa sbyin pa dag la las byed pa na de dag 'di skad ces bdag la bslab bam sbyin cig bdag bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma byed cig ces mi nod na sbyin par byed du zin kyang byin pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If one does not accept the conferral of the precepts, the request for the precepts, or the conferral of vows, and the one who is to perform the rite says, “I will give you the precepts,” or “I will give you full ordination,” then even if the rite is performed, it is not conferred.

original: de la gsol ba nyams so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la gsol ba nyams so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one does not accept, the request is ruined.

original: mi nod pa de la des sdar gsol ba gang yin pa de yang nyams pa yin te /
analyzed: mi nod pa de la des sdar gsol ba gang yin pa de yang nyams pa yin te /
translated: If one does not accept the conferral of the precepts, the request for the precepts, or the conferral of vows, then the request that was previously made is ruined.

original: de'i phyir blang ba'i 'dod pa de yang gsol bar bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir blang ba'i 'dod pa de yang gsol bar bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, the desire to accept is also something to be requested.

original: sngar bzhams te bsgo ba nyid cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sngar bzhams te bsgo ba nyid cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The procedure is to first admonish.

original: de dag la bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de nyid chog yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag la bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de nyid chog yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: The procedure should be understood as just that which is stated: “They should be admonished.”

original: des de ma bsgrubs na cho ga las 'das na las mi 'chags so zhes bstan bas bsgo bar bya ba la yang sngar bzhams te ma bsgo na las mi 'chags so //
analyzed: des de ma bsgrubs na cho ga las 'das na las mi 'chags so zhes bstan bas bsgo bar bya ba la yang sngar bzhams te ma bsgo na las mi 'chags so //
translated: If they do not accomplish that, then the procedure is transgressed and the action is not confessed.

original: gnas nas dbyung ba la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas nas dbyung ba la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The same is true for the suspension from the monastic community.

original: gnas nas dbyung ba la yang sngar bzhams te bsgo ba nyid cho ga nyid yin ba ste /
analyzed: gnas nas dbyung ba la yang sngar bzhams te bsgo ba nyid cho ga nyid yin ba ste /
translated: The procedure is to first admonish.

original: des na gnas nas dbyung ba la yang bzhams te bsgo ba ma byas par las mi 'chags so //
analyzed: des na gnas nas dbyung ba la yang bzhams te bsgo ba ma byas par las mi 'chags so //
translated: Therefore, if one does not admonish, the action is not confessed.

original: dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni pha rol gyi sems gtang pa nyid gtso bo yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni pha rol gyi sems gtang pa nyid gtso bo yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The main point of “Please consider” and so on is that the other’s mind is let go.

original: dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya bdag la pha rol gyis sems gtad pa nyid gtso bo yin te gang gi phyir de ltar ma yin pa de'i phyir sems gtod par byed pa dag gis sems gtad na /
analyzed: dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya bdag la pha rol gyis sems gtad pa nyid gtso bo yin te gang gi phyir de ltar ma yin pa de'i phyir sems gtod par byed pa dag gis sems gtad na /
translated: The principal factor in confessing an offense is the other's attention to one's confession.

original: las byed pas dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa ma brjod kyang las mi 'chags par dogs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: las byed pas dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa ma brjod kyang las mi 'chags par dogs par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, if the other is paying attention, one should not fear that one's offense is not confessed even though one does not say, I ask the saṅgha to listen.🔽The word etc.

original: sogs pa zhes smos pa'i sgras ni /🔽dge 'dun btsun pa @273a * //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes smos pa'i sgras ni / dge 'dun btsun pa @273a * //
translated: refers to the following:

original: rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: Venerable saṅgha, please listen.

original: btsun pa dgongs su gsol /
analyzed: btsun pa dgongs su gsol /
translated: Venerable, please pay attention.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gsan du gsol /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gsan du gsol /
translated: Venerable, please listen.🔽Venerable, please be attentive.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag sems sdus shig / sems sdus shig ces bya ba sngags dag bsdu bar rig par bya'o //🔽don gyi skabs dag gis go rims 'khrugs pas ni mi 'chags pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag sems sdus shig / sems sdus shig ces bya ba sngags dag bsdu bar rig par bya'o // don gyi skabs dag gis go rims 'khrugs pas ni mi 'chags pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is known that the words of the mantra are to be recited in reverse order.🔽It is not the case that one does not confess offenses due to the disorder of the order of the words in the context.

original: gsol ba'i bdag nyid dam brjod pa'i bdag nyid kyi tshig gi go rims 'khrugs pa /
analyzed: gsol ba'i bdag nyid dam brjod pa'i bdag nyid kyi tshig gi go rims 'khrugs pa /
translated: The order of the words in the request or expression is disordered.

original: dper na ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol te zhes brjod par bya ba la /
analyzed: dper na ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol te zhes brjod par bya ba la /
translated: For example, if one says, “This one named so-and-so requests full ordination from the Saṅgha through the preceptor named so-and-so,”

original: dge 'dun las ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ming 'di zhes bgyi bas bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol te zhes bya ba lta bu'i tshig gi go rims 'khrugs pas ni las mi 'chags par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge 'dun las ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ming 'di zhes bgyi bas bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol te zhes bya ba lta bu'i tshig gi go rims 'khrugs pas ni las mi 'chags par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the order of the words is confused, saying, “This one named so-and-so requests full ordination from the Saṅgha through the preceptor named so-and-so.”

original: de yang tshig gi phrad snga phyi 'khrugs pas go par byed pa ma yin na ni mi 'chags so //
analyzed: de yang tshig gi phrad snga phyi 'khrugs pas go par byed pa ma yin na ni mi 'chags so //
translated: If the order of the words is confused and the meaning is not understood, then the rite is not accomplished.

original: go bar byed ba yin na ni 'chags so //
analyzed: go bar byed ba yin na ni 'chags so //
translated: If the meaning is understood, then the rite is accomplished.

original: de ni mi bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni mi bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “That should not be done” means🔽that the words “Please listen,” and so on, are missing, and the order of the words is confused.

original: dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig med pa dang / don gyi skabs dag gi go rims 'khrugs pa de ni mi bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig med pa dang / don gyi skabs dag gi go rims 'khrugs pa de ni mi bya ba nyid de /
translated: That should not be done.🔽“That is a corruption” means

original: de ni zur chag pa yin pas de ltar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni zur chag pa yin pas de ltar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
translated: that if one acts in that way, it is a fault.

original: mtshan gzhan la brten pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshan gzhan la brten pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is not by relying on another name.

original: dge slong zhes brjod par bya ba la dge slong ma nyid du brjod pa dang / dge slong ma zhes brjod par bya ba la dge slong nyid du brjod pa la sogs pa ni las mi 'chags pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong zhes brjod par bya ba la dge slong ma nyid du brjod pa dang / dge slong ma zhes brjod par bya ba la dge slong nyid du brjod pa la sogs pa ni las mi 'chags pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not that one does not confess a transgression by saying, “I have committed the act of a fully ordained monk,” when one is not a fully ordained monk, or by saying, “I have committed the act of a fully ordained nun,” when one is not a fully ordained nun.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is the teaching.

original: mtshan gzhan brjod pas ni las mi 'chags par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: mtshan gzhan brjod pas ni las mi 'chags par mi 'gyur te /
translated: One does not fail to confess a transgression by using another name.

original: rjod pa la nyes byas su ni 'gyur ro //🔽dge slong dang dge slong ma nyid dag gi las gzhan byed pas ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /🔽dge slong nyid la dge slong ma nyid kyi las byed pa mi 'chags pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rjod pa la nyes byas su ni 'gyur ro // dge slong dang dge slong ma nyid dag gi las gzhan byed pas ma yin no zhes bya ba ni / dge slong nyid la dge slong ma nyid kyi las byed pa mi 'chags pa ma yin la /
translated: One does commit an offense of wrong speech.🔽It is not by performing the actions of another class.🔽It is not that one does not confess the act of a fully ordained monk by performing the actions of a fully ordained nun,

original: dge slong ma nyid la dge slong nyid kyi las byed pa yang mi 'chags pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong ma nyid la dge slong nyid kyi las byed pa yang mi 'chags pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: or that one does not confess the act of a fully ordained nun by performing the actions of a fully ordained monk.

original: de lta bas na dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i las la dge slong ma rnams kyi bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i las kyi cho ga gang yin pa de byed na nyams pa cung zad kyang med kyi /
analyzed: de lta bas na dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i las la dge slong ma rnams kyi bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i las kyi cho ga gang yin pa de byed na nyams pa cung zad kyang med kyi /
translated: Therefore, if the rite for full ordination of a bhikṣuṇī is performed in the rite for full ordination of a bhikṣu, there is no fault whatsoever.

original: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun pa sogs pa la sogs pa lhag pa dag @273b yod par zad de /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i dge 'dun pa sogs pa la sogs pa lhag pa dag @273b yod par zad de /

translated: He does not hold on to the idea that he should not endure the thought of making the Saṅgha’s gains and status non-existent and baseless.

translated: If he does not hold it that way, and if he asks for forgiveness, the Saṅgha should do a forgiveness procedure.🔽“He does not hold that a person who is a relative, a neighbor, or a blood relative is a refuge.”

original: bla'i grva yang rten nyid du mi 'dzin /🔽'og gi gzu bo yang rten nyid du mi 'dzin /

analyzed: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du /
translated: The venerable Saṅgha, out of compassion,

original: bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khang pa'i bzhi rung ba rtsod pa ma mchis pa brtsam du rung ba bstan pa stsal du gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag dge slong lag gi bla ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khang pa'i bzhi rung ba rtsod pa ma mchis pa brtsam du rung ba bstan pa stsal du gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: please grant the monk named so-and-so the demonstration of a suitable site for a house, which is not disputed, and suitable for beginning.

original: gzhi ma zhi bar shes nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas nan thur gyi las kyi rgyu thun mong ba bstan nas /
analyzed: gzhi ma zhi bar shes nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas nan thur gyi las kyi rgyu thun mong ba bstan nas /
translated: Having understood that the basis is not peaceful, etc. teaches the common cause of the action of censure.

original: da ni rgyu gang la nan thur gyi las gang dag bya ba de dag gi bye brag bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rgyu gang la nan thur gyi las gang dag bya ba de dag gi bye brag bstan par bya ste /
translated: Now, the specific causes of the actions of censure should be taught.

original: 'thab krol byed pa la las kyis bsdigs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'thab krol byed pa la las kyis bsdigs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One who quarrels should be censured by action.

original: gang zag 'thab krol byed pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsdigs par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag 'thab krol byed pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsdigs par bya'o //
translated: One who is quarrelsome should be threatened with a legal procedure consisting of a proclamation and a proposal.

original: de'i sngags ni /
analyzed: de'i sngags ni /
translated: The formula for that is:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Your reverences, the saṅgha, listen!

original: dge slong dmar ser can 'di dag ni 'thab krol bgyid par mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa rtsod par bgyid pa 'gyed par bgyid pa rtsod pa'i bzhi bgyid pa lags te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong dmar ser can 'di dag ni 'thab krol bgyid par mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa rtsod par bgyid pa 'gyed par bgyid pa rtsod pa'i bzhi bgyid pa lags te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: These monks who are quarrelsome, who cause legal issues, who argue, who quarrel, who cause strife in the saṅgha, who do not want unity in the saṅgha, are not making amends for their offense.”

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba phyir mi 'chos par rgyun du byed pa la smad pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba phyir mi 'chos par rgyun du byed pa la smad pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The censure of one who does not make amends for a serious offense is a continuous act.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du 'byin cing snga ma phyir ma bcos par @277a * //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du 'byin cing snga ma phyir ma bcos par @277a * //
translated: One who commits a serious offense again and again, who does not make amends for the previous one,

original: yang dang yang du 'byin pa la ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis smad par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dang yang du 'byin pa la ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis smad par bya'o //
translated: should be censured with a legal procedure consisting of a proclamation and a proposal.

original: de'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: de'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: The formula for that is: “Your reverences, the saṅgha, listen!

original: dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa 'di dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du bgyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong dge ldan ltung ba rgyun du bgyid pa 'di dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rgyun du bgyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The expression This monk possessing virtue who is a regular offender, is a regular offender of a partial defeat and so on is stated.

original: khyim sun 'byin pa la ni bskrad pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyim sun 'byin pa la ni bskrad pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The expression expulsion for the one who corrupts a house means:

original: khyim sun 'byin pa ma btang ba la ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: khyim sun 'byin pa ma btang ba la ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bskrad par bya'o //
translated: The one who corrupts a house who has not given up that action should be expelled by a proposal and a formal act with four parts.

original: de'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: de'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: The formula for that is: The community of monks, sirs, please listen!

original: dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang na ba so 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa lags te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang na ba so 'di gnyis khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa lags te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: These two monks, Tarjanīya and Bāhuka, corrupt a house and engage in sinful actions and so on.

original: de'i phyir 'du ba mi sbyin pa dang / skabs mi 'byed pa dag la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'du ba mi sbyin pa dang / skabs mi 'byed pa dag la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, the expression also for not giving leave and not granting permission means:

original: bskrad par bya ba de'i phyir 'du ba mi sbyin pa dang / skabs mi 'byed pa dag la yang gnas nas bskrad pa'i phyir gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o //
analyzed: bskrad par bya ba de'i phyir 'du ba mi sbyin pa dang / skabs mi 'byed pa dag la yang gnas nas bskrad pa'i phyir gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o //
translated: For the purpose of expelling him, the Saṅgha should perform the legal procedure of asking him four times, even if he does not give up his bad behavior and does not make amends for it.

original: 'di skad bstan te /🔽gal te khyim sun 'byin par byed pa de bskrad pa'i las bya ba'i phyir /🔽dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dur mi btub pa'am /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te / gal te khyim sun 'byin par byed pa de bskrad pa'i las bya ba'i phyir / dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dur mi btub pa'am /
translated: This is what is taught:🔽If the Saṅgha is unable to expel a monk who is a troublemaker,🔽even though he does not give up his bad behavior and does not make amends for it,

original: skabs mi 'byed du zin kyang grags pa tsam gyis dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i las bya ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: skabs mi 'byed du zin kyang grags pa tsam gyis dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i las bya ba kho na yin no //
translated: the Saṅgha should expel him by means of mere hearsay.

original: de mthong ngo zhes zer ba yang do zhes bya ba ni /🔽khyim sun 'byin pa de dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dus shing skabs 'byed du zin kyang ltung ba de ma mthong ngo zhes zer na /
analyzed: de mthong ngo zhes zer ba yang do zhes bya ba ni / khyim sun 'byin pa de dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dus shing skabs 'byed du zin kyang ltung ba de ma mthong ngo zhes zer na /
translated: If he says, “I see it,”🔽then even if the troublemaker has given up his bad behavior and made amends for it,

original: de ltar na yang grags ba tsam gyis dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na yang grags ba tsam gyis dge 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i las bya'o //
translated: the Saṅgha should expel him by means of mere hearsay.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is what is taught:

original: gal te khyim sun 'byin pa de bdag nyid la khyim sun 'byin pa nyid ma mthong ngo zhes zer na /
analyzed: gal te khyim sun 'byin pa de bdag nyid la khyim sun 'byin pa nyid ma mthong ngo zhes zer na /
translated: If the monk who is causing the schism says, “I do not see that I am causing a schism in the order,”

original: de lta na yang grags pa tsam gyis dag 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i las bya ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang grags pa tsam gyis dag 'dun gyis bskrad pa'i las bya ba kho na yin te /
translated: then the order should expel him by a formal act of condemnation, even though it is only on the basis of hearsay.

original: khyim pa la brnyas thabs byed pa la ni phyir 'gyed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyim pa la brnyas thabs byed pa la ni phyir 'gyed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The act of censure is for disrespecting householders.”

original: khyim pa la mtho btsams pa ni brnyas thabs byed pa ste /
analyzed: khyim pa la mtho btsams pa ni brnyas thabs byed pa ste /
translated: Disrespecting householders is to insult them.

original: gang khyim pa la brnyas thabs byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos las 'das pa yin pas de las phyir bzlog pa'i phyir de la ni phyir 'gyed pa'i nan thur gyi las bya'o //
analyzed: gang khyim pa la brnyas thabs byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos las 'das pa yin pas de las phyir bzlog pa'i phyir de la ni phyir 'gyed pa'i nan thur gyi las bya'o //
translated: Since insulting householders is a transgression of the rules for a monk, the act of censure is done to turn him away from that.

original: phyir 'gyed ba zhes bya ba ni khyim pa'i chad pa bsal pa'i phyir dge @277b slong de la ji srid du khyod kyis las kyi mtha' 'di ma gtong gi bar du khyod kyi yul las ded kyi mdza' gcugs kyi dngos po dang dga' ba'i dngos po phyir bsdu
analyzed: phyir 'gyed ba zhes bya ba ni khyim pa'i chad pa bsal pa'i phyir dge @277b slong de la ji srid du khyod kyis las kyi mtha' 'di ma gtong gi bar du khyod kyi yul las ded kyi mdza' gcugs kyi dngos po dang dga' ba'i dngos po phyir bsdu
translated: The term expulsion means that the monk is expelled from the country until he gives up that action, in order to clear away the lay person's offense.

original: zhing nged phyir 'gyed par bya'o zhes gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsko ba'o //
analyzed: zhing nged phyir 'gyed par bya'o zhes gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsko ba'o //
translated: The request is made with a four-part formal procedure: We will gather back the monk's friendly and pleasant things and expel him.

original: de'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol //
analyzed: de'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol //
translated: The mantra for that is: Virtuous saṅgha, please listen!

original: dge slong dam pa 'di khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid na /
analyzed: dge slong dam pa 'di khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid na /
translated: If this excellent monk acts contemptuously toward a lay person,

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa la slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong dam pa khyim pa la brnyas thabs bgyid pa la slar 'gyed pa'i phrin las mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: if the time is right for the saṅgha and you accept, please grant that the saṅgha perform the action of expelling this excellent monk who acts contemptuously toward a lay person.

original: 'di la bzod pa gsol ba'i las kyi gnas su de la bzod pa gsol du gzhug go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di la bzod pa gsol ba'i las kyi gnas su de la bzod pa gsol du gzhug go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In this case, the one who is to be asked for forbearance should be asked for forbearance in the case of the act of reconciliation.

original: phyir 'gyed pa'i las 'di la bzod pa gsol ba'i las kyi gnas su khyim pa de la bzod pa gsol du gzhug pa yin par blta bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyir 'gyed pa'i las 'di la bzod pa gsol ba'i las kyi gnas su khyim pa de la bzod pa gsol du gzhug pa yin par blta bar bya ba'o //
translated: This should be seen as the one who is to be asked for forbearance in the case of the act of reconciliation, the layperson who is to be asked for forbearance.

original: 'on kyang gsol ba byas te de khyim pa la bzod pa gsol du gzhug par bya ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang gsol ba byas te de khyim pa la bzod pa gsol du gzhug par bya ste /
translated: However, having made a request, he should be asked for forbearance by the layperson.

original: khyim pas bzod pa nyid bzod pa byas par yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: khyim pas bzod pa nyid bzod pa byas par yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The layperson should be understood to have made forbearance.

original: ltung ba grags pa phyir ma bcos pa bsdams pas phyir bcos su mi rung ba dang / ma mthong ngo zhes zer zhing phyir 'chos pa rjes su bsgrub par mi 'dod pa dang sdig pa can gyi lta ba mi gtong ba la ni gnas nas dbyung ba bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ltung ba grags pa phyir ma bcos pa bsdams pas phyir bcos su mi rung ba dang / ma mthong ngo zhes zer zhing phyir 'chos pa rjes su bsgrub par mi 'dod pa dang sdig pa can gyi lta ba mi gtong ba la ni gnas nas dbyung ba bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the case of a downfall that is well known, not corrected, and not restrained, it is not suitable to correct it. In the case of one who says, “I have not seen it,” and does not wish to subsequently practice the correction, and in the case of one who does not give up a sinful view, he should be expelled from the community.

original: phyir mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas dbyung ba gsum go rims bzhin du bstan to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang / sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas dbyung ba gsum go rims bzhin du bstan to //
translated: The three, the one who is expelled for not making amends, the one who is expelled for not seeing, and the one who is expelled for not relinquishing the form of the view of the evil one, are taught in order.

original: de la ltung ba grags pa phyir ma bcos pa bsdams bas phyir bcos su mi rung ba zhes bya bas ni phyir mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba bstan te /
analyzed: de la ltung ba grags pa phyir ma bcos pa bsdams bas phyir bcos su mi rung ba zhes bya bas ni phyir mi 'chos pas gnas nas dbyung ba bstan te /
translated: The one who is expelled for not making amends is taught by the one who is not fit to be restored because of not making amends for a known downfall and because of being restrained.

original: ltung ba grags pa zhes bya ba ni ltung ba de gnas nas 'byin par byed pas shes par gyur pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ltung ba grags pa zhes bya ba ni ltung ba de gnas nas 'byin par byed pas shes par gyur pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: A known downfall is any downfall that is known because it causes one to be expelled from the community.

original: phyir ma bcos pa zhes bya ba ni ltung ba grags pa de zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: phyir ma bcos pa zhes bya ba ni ltung ba grags pa de zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: Not making amends is connected to the known downfall.

original: ltung ba de phyir ma bcos shing ma bshags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ltung ba de phyir ma bcos shing ma bshags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means that downfall is not amended and not confessed.

original: bsdams pas phyir bcos su mi rung ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsdams pas phyir bcos su mi rung ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Not fit to be restored because of being restrained means

original: gal te 'di ltar ltung ba 'di bsdams pas phyir bcos su mi rung gi bshags par bya ba ma yin @278a * //
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar ltung ba 'di bsdams pas phyir bcos su mi rung gi bshags par bya ba ma yin @278a * //
translated: If the Saṅgha knows that this downfall is not to be confessed because it cannot be amended by being restrained from it,

original: no zhes bya bar dge 'dun gyis shes pa ste /
analyzed: no zhes bya bar dge 'dun gyis shes pa ste /
translated: then,

original: de ltar shes kyang ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir mi 'chos pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar shes kyang ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir mi 'chos pa la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: even though they know that, they should perform the act of ejecting him from the place by means of the proposal and the four parts of the formal act, because he does not amend that downfall in accordance with the teaching.

original: de'i sngags ni /
analyzed: de'i sngags ni /
translated: The mantra for that is:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: “Virtuous Saṅgha, please listen!

original: dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung yang de chos bzhin du spar mi 'chos na /
analyzed: dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung yang de chos bzhin du spar mi 'chos na /
translated: This monk Saṅgharakṣita has a downfall, but does not amend it in accordance with the teaching.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dag 'dun gyis gnang par mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba slar mi 'chos pa de la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dag 'dun gyis gnang par mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba slar mi 'chos pa de la gnas nas dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If the time of the Saṅgha has come and it is acceptable to the Saṅgha, the Saṅgha will perform the act of ejecting the monk Saṅgharakṣita from the place because he does not amend that downfall.”

original: ma mthong zhes zer zhing phyir 'chos pa rjes su bsgrub par mi 'dod pa zhes bya bas ni ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba bstan te /
analyzed: ma mthong zhes zer zhing phyir 'chos pa rjes su bsgrub par mi 'dod pa zhes bya bas ni ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba bstan te /
translated: The phrase who does not wish to confess and to make amends for his offense indicates that he is to be expelled from the monastery.

original: ma mthong zhes zer zhing phyir 'chos pa rjes su bsgrub pa mi 'dod pa'i gang zag de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma mthong zhes zer zhing phyir 'chos pa rjes su bsgrub pa mi 'dod pa'i gang zag de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase who does not wish to confess and to make amends for his offense indicates that the individual is to be expelled from the monastery by means of a formal act consisting of an announcement and three recitations.

original: de'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: de'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: The formula for this is as follows: May the saṅgha, venerable sirs, listen to me!

original: dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'dun pa 'di la ltung ba byung ste /
translated: This monk Saṅgharakṣita has committed an offense,

original: de la dge slong rnams kyis glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang ltung ba ma mthong ngo zhes mchi na /
analyzed: de la dge slong rnams kyis glengs shing dran par bgyis kyang ltung ba ma mthong ngo zhes mchi na /
translated: and although the monks have accused him and reminded him of it, he says, 'I do not see the offense.'

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba mi mthong ba la gnas nas dbyung pa'i phrin las mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'dun pa ltung ba mi mthong ba la gnas nas dbyung pa'i phrin las mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If the time is right for the saṅgha and if the saṅgha accepts it, the saṅgha will perform the act of expelling Saṅgharakṣita from the monastery for not seeing his offense.

original: sdig pa can gyi lta ba mi gtong zhes bya bas ni sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas dbyung ba bstan te /
analyzed: sdig pa can gyi lta ba mi gtong zhes bya bas ni sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas dbyung ba bstan te /
translated: The line who do not abandon their sinful view teaches that they are expelled from the order because they do not abandon their sinful view.

original: sdig pa can gyi lta pa'i rnam pa mi gtong ba de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung ba bya'o //
analyzed: sdig pa can gyi lta pa'i rnam pa mi gtong ba de la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gnas nas dbyung ba bya'o //
translated: They are expelled from the order by a proposal and a single proclamation of the four-part formal procedure.🔽The formula is:

original: da'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: da'i sngags ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: Venerable monks, please listen!

original: dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //🔽'di nyid du ltung ba 'di phyir bcos par gyis shig /
analyzed: dge slong 'chi ltas 'di la sdig pa can gyi lta pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no // 'di nyid du ltung ba 'di phyir bcos par gyis shig /
translated: This monk Chanda has developed this kind of sinful view.🔽You must amend this downfall right here in this community.

original: dge 'dun 'di nyid kyis khyod bag yangs su byed par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'di nyid kyis khyod bag yangs su byed par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This community will grant you relief.

original: de ltar nan thur gyi las bdun pa dag las gang yang rung ba byas pa'i rjes la las byed pa'i dge 'dun gyis gang la byas pa'i gang zag de la de skad @278b bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nan thur gyi las bdun pa dag las gang yang rung ba byas pa'i rjes la las byed pa'i dge 'dun gyis gang la byas pa'i gang zag de la de skad @278b bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: After any of these seven acts of suspension, the monks who are performing the act should tell the person it is being done to:

original: 'di nyid du zhes bya ba ni gnas nyid du'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid du zhes bya ba ni gnas nyid du'o //
translated: “In this very place” means in the same place.

original: ltung ba 'di phyir bcos par gyis shig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ltung ba 'di phyir bcos par gyis shig ces bya ba ni /
translated: “You should make amends for this downfall” means

original: gnas 'di nyid du ltung ba 'di phyir bcos par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas 'di nyid du ltung ba 'di phyir bcos par bya'o //
translated: “You should make amends for this downfall in this very place.”

original: gnas gzhan du 'chos su mi gnang par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas gzhan du 'chos su mi gnang par bstan pa yin no //
translated: It shows that it is not permitted to make amends in another place.

original: dge 'dun 'di nyid kyis khyod pag yongs su byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'di nyid kyis khyod pag yongs su byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “This very Saṅgha will give you absolution” means

original: dge 'dun 'di nyid la rag las pa yin gyi /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'di nyid la rag las pa yin gyi /
translated: “It depends on this very Saṅgha.

original: dge 'dun 'dis ma gnang na 'tshams gzhan gyi dge 'dun gyis bag yongs su byed par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun 'dis ma gnang na 'tshams gzhan gyi dge 'dun gyis bag yongs su byed par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: If this Saṅgha does not give you absolution, no other Saṅgha will give you absolution.”

original: ltung ba bcab par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ltung ba bcab par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “You should not conceal a downfall” means

original: rang gi ltung ba'i dbang du byas pa yin gyi gzhan gyi 'chab pa'i nyes pa ni bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ltung ba'i dbang du byas pa yin gyi gzhan gyi 'chab pa'i nyes pa ni bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is done in the presence of one’s own downfall, but the fault of concealing another’s downfall has already been explained.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rang gi ltung ba thams cad kyang gang zag gi mdun du lan gsum mthol shing bshags par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rang gi ltung ba thams cad kyang gang zag gi mdun du lan gsum mthol shing bshags par bya ba yin no //
translated: Not only the remaining part of the Saṃgha, but also all one’s own downfalls are to be confessed and admitted three times in the presence of a person.🔽The formula for that is:

original: de'i sngags ni tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol /
analyzed: de'i sngags ni tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol /
translated: “Venerable one, please pay attention!

original: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ltung ba 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
analyzed: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ltung ba 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
translated: This kind of downfall has arisen for me, named so-and-so.

original: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ltung ba de tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du mtho lo 'chags so //
analyzed: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ltung ba de tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du mtho lo 'chags so //
translated: In the presence of the Venerable One, I, named so-and-so, confess and admit this downfall.

original: mi 'chab po //
analyzed: mi 'chab po //
translated: I will not conceal it.

original: mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If I confess and admit it, I will be at ease.

original: ma mthol ma bshags na ni mi 'gyur ro //🔽lan gsum du bzlas ltung ba mthong ngam /
analyzed: ma mthol ma bshags na ni mi 'gyur ro // lan gsum du bzlas ltung ba mthong ngam /
translated: If I do not confess and admit it, I will not be at ease.🔽Have you seen the downfall?🔽I have seen it.

original: mthong ngo // phyin chad sdom mam /
analyzed: mthong ngo // phyin chad sdom mam /
translated: Will you restrain yourself from now on?🔽I will restrain myself.

original: sdom mo // lan gsum du bzlas /
analyzed: sdom mo // lan gsum du bzlas /
translated: Repeat three times.

original: thabs yin no //
analyzed: thabs yin no //
translated: It is a means.

original: legs so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: legs so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is good.

original: gang la mthol bar bya ba'i gang zag med na ni de srid du ma mthol ba la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gang la mthol bar bya ba'i gang zag med na ni de srid du ma mthol ba la nyes pa med do //
translated: If there is no person to whom one should confess, then there is no fault in not confessing for that long.🔽Thus, here the text says:

original: de ltar yang 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa'i zhig ltung ba dang bcas pa dge slong ma mchis pa'i gnas na gnas pas gang la yang ma brjod na bcabs par brjod pa bgyi'am /
analyzed: de ltar yang 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa'i zhig ltung ba dang bcas pa dge slong ma mchis pa'i gnas na gnas pas gang la yang ma brjod na bcabs par brjod pa bgyi'am /
translated: If one who is staying in a place without monks, who has a fault, does not say anything to anyone, should one say that it is concealed?

original: nye ba 'khor mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs ba yin no //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs ba yin no //
translated: Upāli, one should not.

original: tha na ming go bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tha na ming go bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Even if one understands the name alone.

original: gal te rgya cher go bar byed ma nus na tha na ltung byed sde lnga po dag las gang byung ba'i ming tsam yang go bar bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: gal te rgya cher go bar byed ma nus na tha na ltung byed sde lnga po dag las gang byung ba'i ming tsam yang go bar bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: If one is not able to understand it extensively, then at least one should understand the name of whatever occurred from among the five classes of offenses that are grounds for suspension.🔽Here the text says:

original: 'dir gzhung ni bdag la pham par 'gyur ba byung ngo zhe 'am /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni bdag la pham par 'gyur ba byung ngo zhe 'am /
translated: If one thinks, “I have incurred a defeating offense,” or

original: so sor bshags par bya ba'i rigs brjod pa ma byas ba gang yin pa dang / dge slong stan de nyid la 'dug pa des tshe dang ldan pa bdag la @279a * //🔽dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am /
analyzed: so sor bshags par bya ba'i rigs brjod pa ma byas ba gang yin pa dang / dge slong stan de nyid la 'dug pa des tshe dang ldan pa bdag la @279a * // dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am /
translated: The monk who is seated on that seat should say,🔽“Venerable, I have committed a saṃghāvaśeṣa offense,”

original: ltung byed kyi ltung ba byung ngo zhes brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ltung byed kyi ltung ba byung ngo zhes brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: or “I have committed a pāyantika offense.”

original: rgya cher go bar bya bar shin tu rigs mod kyi /
analyzed: rgya cher go bar bya bar shin tu rigs mod kyi /
translated: It is quite reasonable to understand this extensively.

original: tha na ltung ba'i ming yang brjod par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: tha na ltung ba'i ming yang brjod par bya ba nyid do //
translated: At the very least, the name of the offense should be stated.

original: de'i gzhung yang btsun pa bdag gis bslab pa ma phul par mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten to zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i gzhung yang btsun pa bdag gis bslab pa ma phul par mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten to zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The text also says, “Venerable, I have engaged in sexual intercourse, a non-celibate act, without giving up the training.”

original: de lta bas na tha ma'i mthar thug pa'i dbang du byas te ming tsam gyis rig par bya ba nyid du gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na tha ma'i mthar thug pa'i dbang du byas te ming tsam gyis rig par bya ba nyid du gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is stated that the name alone should be understood, based on the final conclusion.

original: nyes byas ni gang yang rung bas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyes byas ni gang yang rung bas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Any minor infraction means any of the minor infractions.

original: nyes byas rig par bya ba nyid la ni bdag la ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am /
analyzed: nyes byas rig par bya ba nyid la ni bdag la ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am /
translated: But if it is a wrong doing that is to be acknowledged, one should say,🔽I have incurred a downfall.

original: bdag gis kha na ma tho ba byas so zhes bya ba rnam pa gang yang rung bas rig par bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: bdag gis kha na ma tho ba byas so zhes bya ba rnam pa gang yang rung bas rig par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: The offense is to be confessed to one who is naturally abiding, or to one who is naturally abiding and is within the same boundary.🔽It is to be confessed to one who is naturally abiding, or to one who is naturally abiding and is within the same boundary.

original: de dag gang la rig par bya ba nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gang la rig par bya ba nyid yin zhe na /
translated: To whom is it to be confessed?

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin du gnas pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin du gnas pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: To one who is naturally abiding,

original: dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa la rig par bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa la rig par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: it is to be confessed to a monk who is naturally abiding.

original: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba'i gang zag gi gzhi las /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba'i gang zag gi gzhi las /
translated: Here, the text is from the Chapter on the Individual:

original: nye ba 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa mtshams kyi nang du 'dug pa la'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa mtshams kyi nang du 'dug pa la'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Upali, to one who is naturally abiding, who is within the same boundary.

original: ci lta ba las rang gi phyogs ma yin pa yang rang bzhin du gnas pa yin nam zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ci lta ba las rang gi phyogs ma yin pa yang rang bzhin du gnas pa yin nam zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: How is it that one who is not of one’s own faction is naturally abiding?

original: lta ba tha mi dad pa la'o zhes bya ba ba smras te /
analyzed: lta ba tha mi dad pa la'o zhes bya ba ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “To one who has the same view.”

original: gal te lta ba tha mi dad pa yin na de'i tshe de'i mdun du rig par bya ba nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: gal te lta ba tha mi dad pa yin na de'i tshe de'i mdun du rig par bya ba nyid yin pa'o //
translated: If the views are not different, then at that time, it is to be known in front of that.

original: rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa ma bsnyil ba yang dag par sdom pa dang khyim pa yang dag par sdom pa yang rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa ma bsnyil ba yang dag par sdom pa dang khyim pa yang dag par sdom pa yang rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid yin nam zhe na /
translated: If one who has gone forth but has not completed the novitiate, who has not been expelled, who is in a natural state of restraint, and a layperson who is in a natural state of restraint, are they to be known?

original: de'i phyir bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, it is said: “Together with those who have completed the novitiate.”

original: de la rig par bya ba nyid yin no //🔽dge slong gis kyang dge slong ma la rig par bya ba nyid yin la /
analyzed: de la rig par bya ba nyid yin no // dge slong gis kyang dge slong ma la rig par bya ba nyid yin la /
translated: There, it is to be known.🔽Is it to be known by a fully ordained monk to a fully ordained nun,

original: dge slong mas kyang dge slong la rig par bya ba nyid yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: dge slong mas kyang dge slong la rig par bya ba nyid yin nam zhe na /
translated: and is it to be known by a fully ordained nun to a fully ordained monk?

original: de'i phyir mtshan mthun pa la'o zhes bya ba smras so //
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan mthun pa la'o zhes bya ba smras so //
translated: Therefore, it is said: “With those of the same gender.”

original: de ltar na 'dra ba'i phyir bsnyen par ma rdzogs pas kyang /
analyzed: de ltar na 'dra ba'i phyir bsnyen par ma rdzogs pas kyang /
translated: Thus, because of similarity, even one who has not completed the novitiate

original: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la ltung ba rig par bya ba dang / bshags par bya ba'am zhe na /
analyzed: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la ltung ba rig par bya ba dang / bshags par bya ba'am zhe na /
translated: should know the downfalls of one who has not completed the novitiate, and should confess them.

original: de'i phyir de nyid la 'di dang 'og ma bcas te'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid la 'di dang 'og ma bcas te'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, the root text states, “that very one, together with the lower.”

original: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa de nyid la dge tshul la sogs pas ltung ba rig par bya ba 'di nyid ltung ba bshags par bya @279b pa 'og nas 'byung ba dang bcas te bya'o //
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa de nyid la dge tshul la sogs pas ltung ba rig par bya ba 'di nyid ltung ba bshags par bya @279b pa 'og nas 'byung ba dang bcas te bya'o //
translated: That very one who is fully ordained should confess the downfalls that are to be acknowledged by novices and so on, together with the downfalls that will be mentioned later.

original: ris mthun pa'i yul la ci'i phyir mi rung zhe na /
analyzed: ris mthun pa'i yul la ci'i phyir mi rung zhe na /
translated: Why is it not suitable in a realm that is similar to the one in which one was ordained?

original: de'i phyir rab tu byung ba bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dag ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge 'dun gyis yangs su bzung ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rab tu byung ba bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dag ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge 'dun gyis yangs su bzung ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, the root text states, “because those who are fully ordained but not fully admitted are merely accepted by the saṅgha of fully ordained monks.”

original: de'i phyir dge tshul la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa nyid la rag las pa kho na yin par rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dge tshul la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa nyid la rag las pa kho na yin par rnam par gnas so //
translated: Therefore, it is well established that all the activities of novices and so on are dependent on full ordination.

original: de ltar yang rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dag gis dge 'dun la dgag dbye bya'o zhes gsungs pa las shes so //
analyzed: de ltar yang rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dag gis dge 'dun la dgag dbye bya'o zhes gsungs pa las shes so //
translated: This is also understood from the statement, “Those who are fully ordained but not fully admitted should request the saṅgha to grant the rains retreat.”

original: chos 'di ba la de byas na byas pa nyid do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chos 'di ba la de byas na byas pa nyid do zhes bya ba la /
translated: If one does this to a follower of this Dharma, it is a downfall.

original: chos 'di pa zhes smos pas ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa mtshan mi mthun pa dang rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / khyim pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi lta ba can thams cad bsdu ste /
analyzed: chos 'di pa zhes smos pas ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa mtshan mi mthun pa dang rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang / khyim pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi lta ba can thams cad bsdu ste /
translated: The phrase “a follower of this Dharma” includes all those who have taken full ordination in a different sect, those who have gone forth but have not taken full ordination, and all householders who have the view of the Dharma of the Tathāgata.

original: chos 'di pa de dag la ltung pa rig par bya ba de byas na yang byas pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: chos 'di pa de dag la ltung pa rig par bya ba de byas na yang byas pa nyid yin te /
translated: If one does to them what is to be known as a downfall, it is a downfall.

original: de la rig par byas na bcabs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la rig par byas na bcabs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one confesses it, it is not concealed.

original: 'o na de ltan bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa nges par ci'i phyir byas she na /
analyzed: 'o na de ltan bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa nges par ci'i phyir byas she na /
translated: Well, then, why did the Buddha say, “If one does this to one who has taken full ordination in the same sect,” and so on?

original: sngar de ltar nges par smras pa ni dge 'dun gyis yul la ma gus pa spang ba'i phyir de mi rigs par bstan par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar de ltar nges par smras pa ni dge 'dun gyis yul la ma gus pa spang ba'i phyir de mi rigs par bstan par shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the Buddha said this previously in order to teach that it is not right to disrespect the Saṅgha.

original: 'o na mdo 'di ci'i phyir byas she na /
analyzed: 'o na mdo 'di ci'i phyir byas she na /
translated: Well, then, why did the Buddha say this?

original: ma brjod pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: ma brjod pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: He said it in order to say what has not been said.

original: des na mtshan mi mthun pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa dag la rig par byed na yang bcabs par ni mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: des na mtshan mi mthun pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa dag la rig par byed na yang bcabs par ni mi 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, if one reveals one’s downfalls to those who are fully ordained but whose gender is not certain, one does not conceal the offense.

original: rig par byed pa las nyes byas su ni 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig par byed pa las nyes byas su ni 'gyur ro //
translated: However, one does commit an offense of wrong conduct by revealing the offense.

original: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dag la rig par byed pa dag la ni bcabs par ni mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dag la rig par byed pa dag la ni bcabs par ni mi 'gyur la /
translated: If one reveals one’s downfalls to those who are not fully ordained, one does not conceal the offense.

original: gnas ngan len rig par byed pa las ni ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas ngan len rig par byed pa las ni ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: However, if one reveals a downfall that is a degeneration, one commits a minor offense.

original: gnas ngan len ma yin pa brjod pa las ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas ngan len ma yin pa brjod pa las ni nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
translated: If one reveals a downfall that is not a degeneration, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa mtshan mthun pa dag la rig par byad pa la ni 'chab par yang mi 'gyur la ltung bar yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa mtshan mthun pa dag la rig par byad pa la ni 'chab par yang mi 'gyur la ltung bar yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: If one reveals one’s downfalls to those who are not fully ordained but whose gender is certain, one does not conceal the offense nor does one commit a downfall.

original: 'dir rnam par gzhag pa ni de yin no //
analyzed: 'dir rnam par gzhag pa ni de yin no //
translated: This is the determination.🔽The text of the Vinaya states:

original: 'dir gzhung ni nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa'i gang zag gi gzhi las dge slong la brjod na brjod ces bgyi 'am /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa'i gang zag gi gzhi las dge slong la brjod na brjod ces bgyi 'am /
translated: “Upāli, if a monk reveals his offense to another monk, should that be called a revelation?”

original: nye ba 'khor brjod ces bya'o //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor brjod ces bya'o //
translated: “Upāli, it should be called a revelation.”

original: de bzhin du dge slob ma dang bslab ba byin pa dang / dge slong ma dang dge tshul dang dge tshul ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la brjod na brjod par bgyi'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge slob ma dang bslab ba byin pa dang / dge slong ma dang dge tshul dang dge tshul ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la brjod na brjod par bgyi'am /
translated: So too, if one says to a female novice, a female novice who has received full ordination, a female novice, a male novice, a female novice, a layperson, or a layperson, “I will tell,” then is it telling?

original: nye ba 'khor brjod ces bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //🔽mtshams gzhan na gnas pa @280a * //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor brjod ces bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no // mtshams gzhan na gnas pa @280a * //
translated: Upāli, it is telling.

original: la yang ngo zhes bya ba yang rig par byas na byas pa nyid yin pa ste /
analyzed: la yang ngo zhes bya ba yang rig par byas na byas pa nyid yin pa ste /
translated: It is also known that it is telling if one is in another boundary.🔽If one says, “It is telling if one is in another boundary,” then it is telling.

original: 'di ni mtshams gzhan na gnas pa ni gang gi yan lag nyid kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba de'i dmigs kyis bsal ba yin no //🔽'dir gzhung ni de bzhin du dog sal mchis pa la nam mkha' la mchis pas sam /
analyzed: 'di ni mtshams gzhan na gnas pa ni gang gi yan lag nyid kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba de'i dmigs kyis bsal ba yin no // 'dir gzhung ni de bzhin du dog sal mchis pa la nam mkha' la mchis pas sam /
translated: This is an exception to the rule that if one is in another boundary, it is not telling.

original: nam mkha' la mchis pa la dogs la mchis pas brjod na brjod ces bgyi'am /
analyzed: nam mkha' la mchis pa la dogs la mchis pas brjod na brjod ces bgyi'am /
translated: The text says, “So too, if one is in the sky and one says to one who is on the ground, ‘I will tell,’ or if one is on the ground and one says to one who is in the sky, ‘I will tell,’ then is it telling?

original: nye ba 'khor brjod ces bya ste /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor brjod ces bya ste /
translated: Upāli, it is telling.

original: brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa la nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Telling is a minor offense.”

original: bsgo ba las byung ba rnams ni dge 'dun thams cad la'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsgo ba las byung ba rnams ni dge 'dun thams cad la'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Those from orders are from the entire Saṅgha.

original: bsgo ba las byung ba'i ltung ba rnams ni dge 'dun thams cad la rig par bya ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: bsgo ba las byung ba'i ltung ba rnams ni dge 'dun thams cad la rig par bya ba nyid yin te /
translated: Those from orders are known to be from the entire Saṅgha.🔽The four partial concordances with a faction are the schism of the Saṅgha, following that, causing householders to lose faith, and not relinquishing a disagreeable speech. original: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong stan de nyid la 'dug pa des tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i lang ba byung ngo zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong stan de nyid la 'dug pa des tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i lang ba byung ngo zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: The monk who sits on that seat should say, “Venerables, I have incurred a partial defeat.”

original: gal te rjod par byed na de lta na legs /
analyzed: gal te rjod par byed na de lta na legs /
translated: If he says that, it is good.

original: gal te mi brjod na de la nyi ma de nyid las brtsams te 'chab pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gal te mi brjod na de la nyi ma de nyid las brtsams te 'chab pa 'byung ngo //
translated: If he does not say that, then concealment begins on that very day.

original: dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la ltung byed byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar ngang 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la ltung byed byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar ngang 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The monk should say, “Venerables, I have incurred a minor offense.”

original: so sor bshags par bya ba ni gnas der tshogs pa la'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: so sor bshags par bya ba ni gnas der tshogs pa la'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The confession is to the assembly in that place.

original: thams cad la zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: thams cad la zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The confession is to all those in that place.

original: gnas der dge slong gang dag tshogs pa de dag thams cad 'dir bsdu bar rig par bya'i /
analyzed: gnas der dge slong gang dag tshogs pa de dag thams cad 'dir bsdu bar rig par bya'i /
translated: All those monks who are assembled in that place should be understood to be included in the confession.

original: dge 'dun ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun ni ma yin no //
translated: But the confession is not to the saṅgha.

original: de ltar yang 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: de ltar yang 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: The text here states:

original: gnas kyi nang du song bas dge slong gang dag mthong ba de dag gi drung du ci nas kyang gnas khang la sogs pa na 'khod pa dag la yang grags par 'gyur ba de ltar thos pa dang bcas par brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas kyi nang du song bas dge slong gang dag mthong ba de dag gi drung du ci nas kyang gnas khang la sogs pa na 'khod pa dag la yang grags par 'gyur ba de ltar thos pa dang bcas par brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: When he enters the monastery, he should speak in such a way that the monks he sees will hear him, so that they will know that he is in the monastery, etc.

original: de ltar byas na gal te kha cig la gnyid log pa dang drel ba la sogs @280b pa'i dbang gis grags par ma gyur na yang nyis pa med do //
analyzed: de ltar byas na gal te kha cig la gnyid log pa dang drel ba la sogs @280b pa'i dbang gis grags par ma gyur na yang nyis pa med do //
translated: If he does this, there is no offense if the novices, etc., do not hear him because they are asleep, intoxicated, etc.

original: 'dir gnas kyi gzhi smos pa ni 'du ba'i gnas kyi dpe yin te /
analyzed: 'dir gnas kyi gzhi smos pa ni 'du ba'i gnas kyi dpe yin te /
translated: The mention of the monastery here is an example of a meeting place.

original: phyogs gang du dge slong dag 'du ba der ci nas kyang dge tshul la sogs pa thos par bya ba ma yin pa dag gis thos par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs gang du dge slong dag 'du ba der ci nas kyang dge tshul la sogs pa thos par bya ba ma yin pa dag gis thos par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o //
translated: In whatever place the monks gather, the novices, etc., should not hear what is said there.

original: 'di ni dus cung zhig gnas pa la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dus cung zhig gnas pa la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood to apply to meetings that last only a short time.

original: der 'di ji ltar rig par bya ba nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: der 'di ji ltar rig par bya ba nyid yin zhe na /
translated: How is this to be understood?

original: de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas su gyur pa mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas su gyur pa mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, Venerable Ones, I have committed an offense that is a basis for self-reproach, which I now confess.

original: spyad pa de nges par smad pa nyid dang zas la gdu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir smad pa yin te /
analyzed: spyad pa de nges par smad pa nyid dang zas la gdu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir smad pa yin te /
translated: This is a reproach because that conduct is itself blameworthy and because it is a clinging to food.

original: 'di ltar zang zing med pa'i chos bsgrub pa'i phyir zhugs pa rnams smad pa'i gnas de nyid la rgyug pa ni sgrub pa po la mi rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar zang zing med pa'i chos bsgrub pa'i phyir zhugs pa rnams smad pa'i gnas de nyid la rgyug pa ni sgrub pa po la mi rigs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is not proper for a practitioner to run to that very basis of reproach in order to accomplish the Dharma without material desires.

original: 'di ni smre sngags 'don pa'i rnam pa brjod pas so sor bshags par bya ba nyid du gsungs pa yin gyi bshags pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni smre sngags 'don pa'i rnam pa brjod pas so sor bshags par bya ba nyid du gsungs pa yin gyi bshags pa ni ma yin no //
translated: This is said to be a confession of an offense by the expression of regret, but it is not a confession.

original: bshags pa ni ji ltar ltung byed kyi ltung bas gcig gi mdun du bshags par bya bar gsungs pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: bshags pa ni ji ltar ltung byed kyi ltung bas gcig gi mdun du bshags par bya bar gsungs pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: A confession is like the confession in the presence of one person that is said to be required for a downfall that requires confession and repentance.

original: de ni sngags dang 'dra ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni sngags dang 'dra ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is not like a mantra.

original: rig par bya ba de ni rang gi don du sngags lan gsum brjod pa dang 'dra ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rig par bya ba de ni rang gi don du sngags lan gsum brjod pa dang 'dra ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is to be known is not like the mantra recited three times for one's own purpose,

original: lan gcig brjod pas chog go //
analyzed: lan gcig brjod pas chog go //
translated: but is sufficient to be recited once.

original: sngags ni dge slong gzhan la lan gsum brjod par bya ba de'i mdun du tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sngags ni dge slong gzhan la lan gsum brjod par bya ba de'i mdun du tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The mantra is to be recited three times in front of another monk, and one should sit in front of him with palms joined.

original: yid kyi de las ni bsdams pa byas na ldang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yid kyi de las ni bsdams pa byas na ldang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From that restraint of mind, one rises by the thought,

original: yid kyi nyes byas bdam par bya ba don gyi phyir gzhan shi bar 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa de las ni yang mi bya'o snyam du bsam pa las phyir bzlog pa'i bsam pa byas na ltung ba las phyir ldad bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid kyi nyes byas bdam par bya ba don gyi phyir gzhan shi bar 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa de las ni yang mi bya'o snyam du bsam pa las phyir bzlog pa'i bsam pa byas na ltung ba las phyir ldad bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one thinks, I will not do again that mental fault which is to be restrained, for the sake of the meaning, such as the desire for another's death, and so on, one turns back from the downfall by the thought of turning back.

original: gzhan las ni de dang bcas pa'i bshags pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan las ni de dang bcas pa'i bshags pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From others, it is confession together with that.

original: yid kyis ltung bde las gzhan pa bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba las ni bsdam par bya ba de dang bcas pa'i bshags pa byas na ldang ba ste dag pa dang ma dag pa dag ni bsam pa'i gzhi las byung ba yin pas bsdam par bya ba med
analyzed: yid kyis ltung bde las gzhan pa bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba las ni bsdam par bya ba de dang bcas pa'i bshags pa byas na ldang ba ste dag pa dang ma dag pa dag ni bsam pa'i gzhi las byung ba yin pas bsdam par bya ba med
translated: One should confess downfalls other than those that are to be restrained, and one should rise from them, i.e., become pure, through confession.

original: na bshags pas cir yang mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dir gzhung ni phyin chad sdom mam /
analyzed: na bshags pas cir yang mi 'gyur ro // 'dir gzhung ni phyin chad sdom mam /
translated: If one does not have the restraint, confession will not help at all.

original: sdom mo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sdom mo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here the text says, “One should restrain oneself from now on, or one should restrain oneself.”

original: tshig tu brjod pa ni sems bzlog pa sngon du btang ba yin gyi gzhan du na brdzun du smra ba kho nar 'gyur ro //🔽de ltar yang bsam pas ltung @281a * //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod pa ni sems bzlog pa sngon du btang ba yin gyi gzhan du na brdzun du smra ba kho nar 'gyur ro // de ltar yang bsam pas ltung @281a * //
translated: The words “one should restrain oneself” are preceded by the thought of turning away from evil, otherwise it would be a lie.

original: ba las ldang bar smra'i /
analyzed: ba las ldang bar smra'i /
translated: Thus, it is said that one rises from downfalls through thought,

original: chad pa'i las kyis ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: chad pa'i las kyis ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: but not through the action of a rite.

original: gang la bshags par bya zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang la bshags par bya zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: To whom should one confess?

original: de gcig bu lta ba tha mi dad pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de gcig bu lta ba tha mi dad pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore it says, “To one person, not to one who has a different view.”

original: de zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rang bzhin du gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bstan pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i lta ba tha mi dad pa bstan to //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rang bzhin du gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bstan pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i lta ba tha mi dad pa bstan to //
translated: The word “that” indicates that the view is not different from the previously mentioned distinctions, such as “abiding in one’s own nature.”

original: gcig pu zhes smos pa'i sgras ni mang po dag bsal te /
analyzed: gcig pu zhes smos pa'i sgras ni mang po dag bsal te /
translated: The word “alone” excludes many.

original: 'di ltar gang zag gcig la bshags par bsgrub pa bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang zag gcig la bshags par bsgrub pa bstan to //
translated: Thus, it is taught that confession is performed for one person.

original: de lta bas na rang bzhin du gnas pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa dang mtshan mthun par lta ba tha mi dad pa zhes gang gsungs pa de lta bu gcig la bshags par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na rang bzhin du gnas pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa dang mtshan mthun par lta ba tha mi dad pa zhes gang gsungs pa de lta bu gcig la bshags par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, confession should be performed for one who is like that, who is said to be “abiding in one’s own nature, possessing full ordination, and not different from the view.”

original: ci thams cad la 'am zhe na de'i phyir kha na ma thob mi mthun pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: ci thams cad la 'am zhe na de'i phyir kha na ma thob mi mthun pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: If it is asked, “Is it for all of them?” then the response is, “For those with dissimilar downfalls.”

original: ltung ba mi 'dra ba la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ltung ba mi 'dra ba la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means for dissimilar downfalls.

original: ji ltar kha na ma tho ba mi mthun pa nyid yin zhe na de'i phyir sde tshan las so zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: ji ltar kha na ma tho ba mi mthun pa nyid yin zhe na de'i phyir sde tshan las so zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: If it is asked, “How are they dissimilar?” then the response is, “From the group.”

original: gang gi mdun du bshags par bya ba de dang gal te ltung ba sde tshan las mi mthun pa yin na de la bshags su rung ngo //🔽'dir gzhung ni gleng gzhi dag las btsun pa ltung ba ris mthun pa zhes kyang bgyi /
analyzed: gang gi mdun du bshags par bya ba de dang gal te ltung ba sde tshan las mi mthun pa yin na de la bshags su rung ngo // 'dir gzhung ni gleng gzhi dag las btsun pa ltung ba ris mthun pa zhes kyang bgyi /
translated: If the confession is made in the presence of someone whose class of offense does not match one’s own, then the confession is suitable.🔽Here is the text:

original: ltung ba ris mi mthun pa zhes kyang bgyi na /
analyzed: ltung ba ris mi mthun pa zhes kyang bgyi na /
translated: “Venerable Sir, there are downfalls that are said to be of the same class and downfalls that are said to be of different classes.

original: btsun pa ltung ba ris mthun pa ni gang lags /
analyzed: btsun pa ltung ba ris mthun pa ni gang lags /
translated: Venerable Sir, what are downfalls of the same class?

original: ris mi mthun pa ni gang lags /
analyzed: ris mi mthun pa ni gang lags /
translated: What are downfalls of different classes?”

original: nye ba 'khor pham par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni pham par 'gyur ba dang ris mthun pa yin la /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor pham par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni pham par 'gyur ba dang ris mthun pa yin la /
translated: “Upāli, a defeating offense is of the same class as a defeating offense.

original: de las gzhan pa dang ris mi mthun pa yin no //🔽dge 'dun lhag ma ni dge 'dun lhag ma dang ngo /🔽ltung byed ni ltung byed dang ngo //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa dang ris mi mthun pa yin no // dge 'dun lhag ma ni dge 'dun lhag ma dang ngo / ltung byed ni ltung byed dang ngo //
translated: It is of a different class than the others.🔽A serious offense is of the same class as a serious offense.🔽A minor offense is of the same class as a minor offense.

original: so sor bshags par bya ba ni so sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byas ni nyes pa dang ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: so sor bshags par bya ba ni so sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byas ni nyes pa dang ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: An offense that requires confession is of the same class as an offense that requires confession.🔽An offense of wrongdoing is of the same class as an offense of wrongdoing.”

original: 'dis nyes byas rang dbang can dag bsdus par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dis nyes byas rang dbang can dag bsdus par rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood that this includes independent misdeeds.

original: ltung ba gzhan dang 'brel ba'i nyes byas gang yin pa de ni ltung ba de bshags pa nyid kyis de yang bshags par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ltung ba gzhan dang 'brel ba'i nyes byas gang yin pa de ni ltung ba de bshags pa nyid kyis de yang bshags par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Any misdeed that is related to another downfall is confessed by confessing that downfall.

original: ci de bzla bar mi bya ba yin na ma zhe na de'i phyir med na ltung ba las so zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: ci de bzla bar mi bya ba yin na ma zhe na de'i phyir med na ltung ba las so zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: If one asks, “Is it not to be repeated?,” then the root text states, “If not, then before one who has a downfall.”

original: gang gi mdun du bshags par bya ba sde tshan las kha na ma tho ba mi mthun pa med na ltung ba las kha na tho ba mi mthun pa'i mdun du bshags par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang gi mdun du bshags par bya ba sde tshan las kha na ma tho ba mi mthun pa med na ltung ba las kha na tho ba mi mthun pa'i mdun du bshags par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: If there is no one before whom one can confess a downfall that is not similar to one’s own class of downfall, then one should confess before someone who has a similar class of downfall.🔽Here, the scriptures state:

original: 'dir gzhung ni sil bu dag las btsun pa ltung ba mthun pas ltung ba mthun pa'i mdun du ltung ba bshags su rung @281b ngam nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni sil bu dag las btsun pa ltung ba mthun pas ltung ba mthun pa'i mdun du ltung ba bshags su rung @281b ngam nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo //
translated: “Venerable, is it suitable to confess a similar downfall before one who has a similar downfall?

original: rkyen de lta bu dag yod na ris mi mthun par byas te rung ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rkyen de lta bu dag yod na ris mi mthun par byas te rung ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Upāli, if such conditions exist, then it is suitable to do so, even if they are not similar.”

original: spong ba las ni spangs pa dang bral ba sngon du btang ba las so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: spong ba las ni spangs pa dang bral ba sngon du btang ba las so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From relinquishing, it is relinquished and separated, having previously relinquished.

original: spangs pa'i ltung byed las ni rdzas de spangs pa dang / spangs pa de dang zhag gcig 'bral bar bya ba de gnyis sngon du btang ste bshags na ldang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spangs pa'i ltung byed las ni rdzas de spangs pa dang / spangs pa de dang zhag gcig 'bral bar bya ba de gnyis sngon du btang ste bshags na ldang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From the offense of relinquishment, it is relinquished and separated from that substance, having previously relinquished that for one day.

original: zhag de la chos gos gzhan byin gyis mi brlab par byin gyis brlab tu rung ba'i chos gos med par gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: zhag de la chos gos gzhan byin gyis mi brlab par byin gyis brlab tu rung ba'i chos gos med par gnas par bya'o //
translated: On that day, one should remain without a second ritual robe that is not consecrated, without a consecrated ritual robe that is suitable.

original: chos gos gzhan byin gyis mi brlab par byin gyis brlab tu rung ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos gos gzhan byin gyis mi brlab par byin gyis brlab tu rung ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One should not be separated from a second ritual robe that is not consecrated, from a consecrated ritual robe that is suitable.

original: lhag ma dang bcas par gtogs pa'i sbom po lci ba las ni dge 'dun lnga la sogs pa thams cad la'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lhag ma dang bcas par gtogs pa'i sbom po lci ba las ni dge 'dun lnga la sogs pa thams cad la'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From the heavy weighty offenses that are included in the class of having remainder, it is from all, such as the Saṅgha of five.

original: lhag ma dang bcas par gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lhag ma dang bcas par gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That which is included in the class of having remainder is

original: 'dir phyir bcos pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir phyir bcos pa'i lhag ma dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Since it is a remainder that is amended here, it should be understood as a partial defeat of the Saṅgha.

original: der gtogs pa de dang 'brel pa'i sbom po lci ba las ni mtshams der gtogs pa'i dge 'dun lnga la sogs pa thams cad la bshags pas ldang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der gtogs pa de dang 'brel pa'i sbom po lci ba las ni mtshams der gtogs pa'i dge 'dun lnga la sogs pa thams cad la bshags pas ldang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The heavy partial defeat that is included in that should be confessed to the entire Saṅgha of five or more that is included in that boundary.

original: dge 'dun lhag mar gtogs pa'i sbom po yang ba las ni gang zag gcig la bshags pas ldang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag mar gtogs pa'i sbom po yang ba las ni gang zag gcig la bshags pas ldang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The light partial defeat that is included in the Saṅgha should be confessed to an individual.

original: lhag ma med par gtogs pa'i sbom po lci ba las ni ma bcad pa lhag pa la'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lhag ma med par gtogs pa'i sbom po lci ba las ni ma bcad pa lhag pa la'o zhes bya ba ni /
