analyzed: spyad par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: It is just that she should practice it.

original: yid mgu bar bya ba'i dngos po ni mgu bar bya ba 'o //
analyzed: yid mgu bar bya ba'i dngos po ni mgu bar bya ba 'o //
translated: The thing that pleases is the pleasing.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is what is taught:

original: dge slong mas ni dge 'dun lhag ma 'ba' zhig la gnyi ga'i dge 'dun las zla ba phyed mgu bar bya ba de mnos te /
analyzed: dge slong mas ni dge 'dun lhag ma 'ba' zhig la gnyi ga'i dge 'dun las zla ba phyed mgu bar bya ba de mnos te /
translated: A nun who has committed a pārājika offense must receive the pleasing for half a month from both Sanghas.

original: spyad par bya bar ma zad kyi /
analyzed: spyad par bya bar ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only that,

original: lci ba'i chos las 'das na yang gnyi ga'i dge 'dun las zla ba phyed mgu bar bya ba mnos te /
analyzed: lci ba'i chos las 'das na yang gnyi ga'i dge 'dun las zla ba phyed mgu bar bya ba mnos te /
translated: but if she has transgressed a heavy rule, she must receive the pleasing for half a month from both Sanghas.

original: spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: spyad par bya'o //
translated: And she must practice it.

original: bcabs pa'i nyes pa med na de 'chags so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcabs pa'i nyes pa med na de 'chags so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If there is no fault of concealment, it is confessed.

original: gal te dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba @283b bcabs pa'i nyes pa med na de'i tshe mgu bar bya ba de 'chags pa'o //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba @283b bcabs pa'i nyes pa med na de'i tshe mgu bar bya ba de 'chags pa'o //
translated: If there is no fault of concealing the downfalls of a pārājika offense, then at that time the pleasing is confessed.

original: spongs de med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: spongs de med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The probation is eliminated.

original: spo ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: spo ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As for the probation,

original: ji srid bcabs pa'i dus de srid du chad pa'i las kyis kun du gnas ba des bcabs pa'i nyes pa de 'byung zhing med par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ji srid bcabs pa'i dus de srid du chad pa'i las kyis kun du gnas ba des bcabs pa'i nyes pa de 'byung zhing med par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: for as long as the time of concealment lasts, the probationary punishment remains. By that, the fault of concealment arises and is eliminated.

original: ji srid du sbo bas bcabs pa'i nyes pa med par ma byas pa de srid du mgu bar bya ba mi 'chags so //
analyzed: ji srid du sbo bas bcabs pa'i nyes pa med par ma byas pa de srid du mgu bar bya ba mi 'chags so //
translated: As long as the fault of concealing the offense has not been removed, the penance is not confessed.

original: byas na ni 'chags so //
analyzed: byas na ni 'chags so //
translated: If it has been removed, it is confessed.

original: de'i rjes su 'brang bas ltung ba gzhan dag la yang sngar bcabs pa'i nyes pa phyir bcos par bya zhing phyis ltung ba phyir bcos par bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'brang bas ltung ba gzhan dag la yang sngar bcabs pa'i nyes pa phyir bcos par bya zhing phyis ltung ba phyir bcos par bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: After that, it should be understood that the other downfalls are amended by first amending the fault of concealing the offense and then amending the downfalls.

original: spo ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: spo ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is probation?

original: de'i phyir dge 'dun las dus de srid mnos te'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dge 'dun las dus de srid mnos te'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “One takes that much time from the saṅgha.”

original: ltung ba 'byin par byed pa des dus ji srid du bcabs pa'i dus de srid du spo ba dge 'dun las mnos te'o //
analyzed: ltung ba 'byin par byed pa des dus ji srid du bcabs pa'i dus de srid du spo ba dge 'dun las mnos te'o //
translated: The one who commits the downfall takes that much time from the saṅgha for the probation.

original: de gnyis byed pa nyid na dge 'dun lhag ma de byung na mnos te byas pa de gnyis zhig pas de'i phyir gzhi nas brtsams pa nyid sbyin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de gnyis byed pa nyid na dge 'dun lhag ma de byung na mnos te byas pa de gnyis zhig pas de'i phyir gzhi nas brtsams pa nyid sbyin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If, while those two are being done, the saṅgha’s remainder arises, then the probation and the confession that have been done are destroyed. Therefore, it is said, “The basis is given again.”

original: dge 'dun lhag ma de'i phyir bcos pa'i phyir spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba de gnyis byed pa nyid na dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba rigs mthun pa yang byung na /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma de'i phyir bcos pa'i phyir spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba de gnyis byed pa nyid na dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba rigs mthun pa yang byung na /
translated: If a monk who is undergoing probation or who is undergoing the ritual of reconciliation for a partial defeat commits a partial defeat similar to the previous offense,

original: spo ba la gnas pa mnos pa dang mgu bar bya ba spyad pa mnos te byas pa de gnyis nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: spo ba la gnas pa mnos pa dang mgu bar bya ba spyad pa mnos te byas pa de gnyis nyams pa yin no //
translated: then the probation and the ritual of reconciliation that he has undertaken and performed are lost.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang mi 'dra ba byung bas ni mi nyams so //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang mi 'dra ba byung bas ni mi nyams so //
translated: But if he commits a partial defeat that is not similar to the previous offense, then he does not lose them.

original: gang gi phyir dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung na spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba mnos shing byas pa de gnyis nyams pa de'i phyir gzhi nas brtsams pa nyid sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba byung na spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba mnos shing byas pa de gnyis nyams pa de'i phyir gzhi nas brtsams pa nyid sbyin par bya ste /
translated: Because if he commits a partial defeat similar to the previous offense, then the probation and the ritual of reconciliation that he has undertaken and performed are lost, therefore the basis must be given again.

original: dge slong de la yang gzhi nas brtsams te spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba gnyis sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dge slong de la yang gzhi nas brtsams te spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba gnyis sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: And the basis must be given to that monk again, and both probation and the ritual of reconciliation must be given to him.

original: brtsams pa ni mthar thug par bya ba dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: brtsams pa ni mthar thug par bya ba dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And beginning it is like completing it.

original: spo ba dang gzhi nas spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba brtsams pa gang la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa byung na de'i tshe spo ba la sogs pa brtsams pa de ni mthar thug par bya ba dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: spo ba dang gzhi nas spo ba dang yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba dang / yang gzhi nas bslang ste mgu bar bya ba brtsams pa gang la dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa byung na de'i tshe spo ba la sogs pa brtsams pa de ni mthar thug par bya ba dang 'dra ste /
translated: If a corresponding offense of the category of a monk who is suspended for not recognizing an offense occurs while beginning probation, beginning a trial period, beginning a trial period again after being suspended, pleasing the saṅgha, pleasing the saṅgha again after being suspended, or beginning pleasing the saṅgha again after being suspended, then that beginning is like completing it.

original: mthar phyin par bya ba dang 'dra zhing yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: mthar phyin par bya ba dang 'dra zhing yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste /
translated: It should be regarded as like completing it and like finishing it.

original: yongs su mi gtong ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yongs su mi gtong ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It should not be relinquished.

original: de'i phyir de ma 'chags na de'i tshe dang po yang tha dad par bslang bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ma 'chags na de'i tshe dang po yang tha dad par bslang bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, if it is not confessed, then at that time it should be raised as a separate issue.

original: gang gi phyir brtsams pa ni mthar thug pa dang 'dra ba de'i phyir spo ba la sogs @284a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir brtsams pa ni mthar thug pa dang 'dra ba de'i phyir spo ba la sogs @284a * //
translated: Because the composition is similar to the conclusion, therefore it is not necessary to transfer the merit to enlightenment.

original: pa sngar byin pa gang yin pa de dge 'dun ma tshang ba la sogs pa'i nyes pas ma 'chags shing /
analyzed: pa sngar byin pa gang yin pa de dge 'dun ma tshang ba la sogs pa'i nyes pas ma 'chags shing /
translated: Because the first is similar to the final, therefore any previously given trial periods and so on are not confessed due to the fault of the incomplete saṅgha and so on.

original: de ma 'chags pa'i gnas skabs su dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba rigs mthun par byung na de'i tshe dang po yang dper na ltung ba bar ma ma byung yang spo ba dang mgu bar bya bar sbyin par bya dgos pas
analyzed: de ma 'chags pa'i gnas skabs su dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba rigs mthun par byung na de'i tshe dang po yang dper na ltung ba bar ma ma byung yang spo ba dang mgu bar bya bar sbyin par bya dgos pas
translated: When a similar class of partial defeat arises in the interim, while that has not been confessed, then, for example, even though the intermediate offense has not arisen, the trial period and confession must be given.

original: de bzhin du spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba tha dad par gzhi nas bslangs te sbyin par bya ba nyid yin no //🔽ltung ba par ma phyir bcos pa'i phyir gzhi nas spo ba nyid kyis dang po'i gzhi nas bslang ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba tha dad par gzhi nas bslangs te sbyin par bya ba nyid yin no // ltung ba par ma phyir bcos pa'i phyir gzhi nas spo ba nyid kyis dang po'i gzhi nas bslang ste /
translated: Therefore, the trial period and confession must be separately requested and given from the beginning.

original: spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa lta bur ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa lta bur ni mi bya'o //
translated: For the sake of amending the intermediate offense, the trial period must be given from the beginning, but it is not like the trial period and confession.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is taught.

original: gang gi tshe spo ba snga ma ma 'chags pa de'i tshe dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa byung na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe spo ba snga ma ma 'chags pa de'i tshe dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba rigs mthun pa byung na /
translated: When the former probation has not been confessed, then if a corresponding offense of a partially concordant type arises,

original: spo ba sbyin par bya'i /
analyzed: spo ba sbyin par bya'i /
translated: the probation should be given.

original: gzhi nas spo ba sbyin par ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhi nas spo ba sbyin par ni mi bya'o //
translated: But the original probation should not be given.

original: gang gi tshe gzhi nas spo ba sbyin par ma 'chags na de'i tshe gzhi nas spo ba de nyid gzod sbyin par bya'i /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzhi nas spo ba sbyin par ma 'chags na de'i tshe gzhi nas spo ba de nyid gzod sbyin par bya'i /
translated: When the original probation has not been confessed, then that very original probation should be given.

original: yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin par ni mi ba'o //
analyzed: yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba sbyin par ni mi ba'o //
translated: But the probation for the remainder of the time should not be given.

original: gang gi tshe yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba spyin pa ma 'chags na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang gzhi nas bslang ste spo ba spyin pa ma 'chags na /
translated: When the probation for the remainder of the time has not been confessed,

original: de'i tshe yang gzhi nas bslang ste sbo ba de nyid gzod sbyin par bya'i mgu bar bya ba sbyin par ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang gzhi nas bslang ste sbo ba de nyid gzod sbyin par bya'i mgu bar bya ba sbyin par ni mi bya'o //
translated: then that very probation for the remainder of the time should be given. But the pleasing act should not be given.

original: de ltar na 'dir tshig gi don 'di 'byung ste /
analyzed: de ltar na 'dir tshig gi don 'di 'byung ste /
translated: Thus, the meaning of the words here is as follows.

original: gal te dge slong gis spo ba la sogs pa blangs pa la rkyen gzhan gang yang rung bas spo ba de ma 'chags par de'i skabs su dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung na de'i tshe de la yang sbo ba
analyzed: gal te dge slong gis spo ba la sogs pa blangs pa la rkyen gzhan gang yang rung bas spo ba de ma 'chags par de'i skabs su dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra ba yang byung na de'i tshe de la yang sbo ba
translated: If a monk who has not confessed the previous probation commits a downfall of the same type as the previous downfall, but does not confess it due to any circumstance whatsoever, then probation should be granted to him again.🔽But probation should not be granted from the beginning,🔽because the previous probation has not been confessed.

original: nyid sbyin par bya'i /
analyzed: nyid sbyin par bya'i /
translated: The middle one should be amended.🔽If a monk who has not confessed the previous probation commits a downfall of the same type as the previous downfall, but does not confess it due to any circumstance whatsoever, then probation should be granted to him again.🔽But probation should not be granted from the beginning,🔽because the previous probation has not been confessed.

original: gzhi nas spo ba sbyin par ni mi bya ste /
analyzed: gzhi nas spo ba sbyin par ni mi bya ste /
translated: The middle one should be amended.🔽If a monk who has not confessed the previous probation commits a downfall of the same type as the previous downfall, but does not confess it due to any circumstance whatsoever, then probation should be granted to him again.🔽But probation should not be granted from the beginning,

original: spo ba snga ma shos ma 'chags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spo ba snga ma shos ma 'chags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the previous probation has not been confessed.

original: bar ma de nyid phyir bcos par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bar ma de nyid phyir bcos par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The middle one should be amended.🔽If a monk who has not confessed the previous probation commits a downfall of the same type as the previous downfall, but does not confess it due to any circumstance whatsoever, then probation should be granted to him again.🔽But probation should not be granted from the beginning,🔽because the previous probation has not been confessed.🔽The middle one should be amended.

original: spo ba snga ma shos ma 'chags pa'i skabs su dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra bar byung ba de yal bar mi 'dor bar phyir bcos par bya ba nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: spo ba snga ma shos ma 'chags pa'i skabs su dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba bar ma ltung ba snga ma dang 'dra bar byung ba de yal bar mi 'dor bar phyir bcos par bya ba nyid yin pa'o //
translated: If a monk who has not confessed the previous probation commits a downfall of the same type as the previous downfall, but does not confess it due to any circumstance whatsoever, then probation should be granted to him again.

original: de'i phyir de'i don du yang brten par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i don du yang brten par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: But probation should not be granted from the beginning,🔽because the previous probation has not been confessed.🔽The middle one should be amended.🔽If a monk who has not confessed the previous probation commits a downfall of the same type as the previous downfall, but does not confess it due to any circumstance whatsoever, then probation should be granted to him again.

original: gang gi phyir bar ma de phyir bcos par bya ba de'i phyir gzhi nas brtsams pas gang gi tshe yongs su gnas pa la sogs pa ma chags pa len par byed pa de'i tshe ltung ba phyis byung ba de phyir bcos pa de'i don du yang sngar byung
analyzed: gang gi phyir bar ma de phyir bcos par bya ba de'i phyir gzhi nas brtsams pas gang gi tshe yongs su gnas pa la sogs pa ma chags pa len par byed pa de'i tshe ltung ba phyis byung ba de phyir bcos pa de'i don du yang sngar byung
translated: For the sake of that, the one that occurred earlier is also to be taken up again.

original: ba yang slar blang bar bya ste ltung ba de dag thams cad kyi yul du gyur pa phyir bcos pa'i phyir sems bskyed de rgyud dang 'dra ba'i tshul gyis tshig gcig kho nas spo ba la sogs pa blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ba yang slar blang bar bya ste ltung ba de dag thams cad kyi yul du gyur pa phyir bcos pa'i phyir sems bskyed de rgyud dang 'dra ba'i tshul gyis tshig gcig kho nas spo ba la sogs pa blang bar bya'o //
translated: For the sake of restoring all those down-falls, one should generate the mind and take up the probation and so on with just one statement, in the manner of a continuum.

original: dper na rgyud lan cig brkyang bas rgyu de la skad dang @284b spyad pa la sogs pa'i bya ba du ma cig car byed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na rgyud lan cig brkyang bas rgyu de la skad dang @284b spyad pa la sogs pa'i bya ba du ma cig car byed pa de bzhin du /
translated: For example, by extending a single thread, many actions such as the sound and the movement of the shuttle and so on are done simultaneously on that thread.

original: ltung ba thams cad phyir bcos pa'i phyir lan cig kho nar spo ba la sogs pa blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ltung ba thams cad phyir bcos pa'i phyir lan cig kho nar spo ba la sogs pa blang bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, for the sake of restoring all down-falls, one should take up the probation and so on just once.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is taught.

original: ltung ba snga ma phyir bcos par bya ba'i phyir spo ba la sogs pa len pa gang yin pa de ni ltung ba phyi ma dag phyir bcos par bya ba nyid kyi phyir yang brten par bya ba nyid yin pas ltung ba phyi ma dag gi ming yang
analyzed: ltung ba snga ma phyir bcos par bya ba'i phyir spo ba la sogs pa len pa gang yin pa de ni ltung ba phyi ma dag phyir bcos par bya ba nyid kyi phyir yang brten par bya ba nyid yin pas ltung ba phyi ma dag gi ming yang
translated: Therefore, the names of subsequent downfalls

original: der brjod bar bya'o //
analyzed: der brjod bar bya'o //
translated: are also to be mentioned there.

original: de bcabs pa'i dus lhag pa yang der gzhug pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bcabs pa'i dus lhag pa yang der gzhug pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The duration of concealment of that is also to be added there.

original: ltung ba phyis byung ba de bcabs pa'i dus lhag pa gang yin pa de yang ltung ba snga ma bcabs pa'i dus de nyid du gzhug cing bgrang bar bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: ltung ba phyis byung ba de bcabs pa'i dus lhag pa gang yin pa de yang ltung ba snga ma bcabs pa'i dus de nyid du gzhug cing bgrang bar bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: The duration of concealment of that subsequent downfall is also to be added to and counted as the same duration of concealment of the former downfall.

original: rnam pa gang gis gzhug par bya zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis gzhug par bya zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: By what aspect is it to be added?

original: gzhi nas spo ba 'am yang gzhi nas bslang ste yongs su gnas pa'i ji tsam len pas so //
analyzed: gzhi nas spo ba 'am yang gzhi nas bslang ste yongs su gnas pa'i ji tsam len pas so //
translated: It is added by the duration of taking a trial period from the beginning or being lifted from the beginning and fully remaining.

original: de la lhag pa zhes smos pas ni bcabs pa'i dus mnyam pa gang yin pa dang nyung ba gang yin pa de gnyis lhag pa'i nang du bgrang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de la lhag pa zhes smos pas ni bcabs pa'i dus mnyam pa gang yin pa dang nyung ba gang yin pa de gnyis lhag pa'i nang du bgrang bar mi bya'o //
translated: Since it is called “excessive” here, the time of concealment of the first and the time of concealment of the second are not counted as excessive.

original: des na gang la ltung ba snga ma bcabs pa'i dus zla ba phyed yod la /
analyzed: des na gang la ltung ba snga ma bcabs pa'i dus zla ba phyed yod la /
translated: Therefore, if the time of concealment of the former downfalls is one half month,

original: ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus kyang zla ba phyed yod pa de la ni zla ba phyed kho na spo ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus kyang zla ba phyed yod pa de la ni zla ba phyed kho na spo ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: and the time of concealment of the latter downfalls is also one half month, then only one half month is given for probation.

original: gang la ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus zla ba gcig yod pa de la ni zla ba gcig kho na spo ba sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: gang la ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus zla ba gcig yod pa de la ni zla ba gcig kho na spo ba sbyin par bya ste /
translated: If the time of concealment of the latter downfalls is one month, then only one month is given for probation.

original: des ltung ba snga ma zla ba phyed bcabs ba dang / ltung ba phyi ma zla ba gcig bcabs pa'i nyes pa gnyi ga med par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: des ltung ba snga ma zla ba phyed bcabs ba dang / ltung ba phyi ma zla ba gcig bcabs pa'i nyes pa gnyi ga med par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that in this way, the fault of concealing the former downfalls for one half month and the fault of concealing the latter downfalls for one month are both eliminated.

original: ji ltar ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus lhag pa srid par 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ji ltar ltung ba phyi ma bcabs pa'i dus lhag pa srid par 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: It should be stated how the time of concealment of the latter downfalls can be excessive.

original: spyod pa la zhugs pa la mthar thug nas ltung ba bar ma ma brjod pa dang gzhan du yang ma brjod pas so //
analyzed: spyod pa la zhugs pa la mthar thug nas ltung ba bar ma ma brjod pa dang gzhan du yang ma brjod pas so //
translated: Since the intermediate downfall is not mentioned in the context of engaging in the practice, and is not mentioned elsewhere,

original: rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang 'di lta ste /
translated: it is also mentioned in another way.

original: so ba 'am gzhi nas spo bar byed pas ltung ba rigs mthun pa byung nas /
analyzed: so ba 'am gzhi nas spo bar byed pas ltung ba rigs mthun pa byung nas /
translated: If one commits a downfall of the same type as a downfall that has already occurred,

original: thab krol byed pa 'ong ba'i phyir spo ba la sogs pa btang ste /
analyzed: thab krol byed pa 'ong ba'i phyir spo ba la sogs pa btang ste /
translated: then the probation and so on that were previously granted are relinquished,🔽because one has committed a downfall while on probation.

original: yang phyir len pa des btang ba'i gnas skabs su bcabs pa'i dus ches ring du sgrub par byed pa'o //

analyzed: phyir bcos pa'i gzhi gzhir gtogs pa'o zhes bya ba de 'dul ba'i gzhi'i skabs su gtogs pa bshad zin to /
translated: The basis for amendment is included in the bases of training.

original: // / da ni phyir bcos pa'i gzhi zhu ba'i skabs bsdu ba'i phyir tshul khrims 'chal ba bskrad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni smras te /
analyzed: // / da ni phyir bcos pa'i gzhi zhu ba'i skabs bsdu ba'i phyir tshul khrims 'chal ba bskrad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni smras te /
translated: Now, in order to conclude the section on the basis of amendment, it is said: “The immoral should be expelled.”

original: 'dir tshul khrims 'chal ba zhes bya ba ni pham par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir tshul khrims 'chal ba zhes bya ba ni pham par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, “immoral” should be understood as one who has incurred a defeating offense.

original: 'di la dge 'dun dbang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di la dge 'dun dbang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here, the Saṅgha has power.

original: tshul khrims 'chal ba bskrad pa 'di la dge 'dun dbang ba nyid de /
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal ba bskrad pa 'di la dge 'dun dbang ba nyid de /
translated: In this expulsion of the immoral, the Saṅgha has power.

original: gtsug lag khang gi bya ba ni tshogs la rag lus pa nyid yin pa'i @298a * //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi bya ba ni tshogs la rag lus pa nyid yin pa'i @298a * //
translated: Because the activities of the monastery depend on the assembly,

original: phyir de la dge 'dun dbang ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: phyir de la dge 'dun dbang ba nyid yin no //
translated: the Saṅgha has power over that.

original: 'dir gzhung ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba bskrad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba bskrad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na /
translated: Here, the text states: “The Blessed One said, ‘The immoral monk should be expelled.’

original: gang gis bskrad par bgyis /
analyzed: gang gis bskrad par bgyis /
translated: By whom should he be expelled?”

original: dge 'dun gyis so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “By the Saṅgha,” it was said.

original: des de yal bar mi dor ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: des de yal bar mi dor ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “He should not abandon him.”

original: dge 'dun des tshul khrims 'chal ba bskrad pa de yal bar mi dor ba ste dge 'dun gyis de la 'bad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dge 'dun des tshul khrims 'chal ba bskrad pa de yal bar mi dor ba ste dge 'dun gyis de la 'bad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The Saṅgha should not ignore the expulsion of a corrupt monk; it is the meaning that the Saṅgha should strive in that.

original: bsnyil ba la bzod par bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsnyil ba la bzod par bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should tolerate the suspension.

original: dge tshul bsnyil ba'i las byas pa la ji ltar nan thur byas pa gzhan dag la bzod par bya ba de bzhin du de la yang bzod par bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: dge tshul bsnyil ba'i las byas pa la ji ltar nan thur byas pa gzhan dag la bzod par bya ba de bzhin du de la yang bzod par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: Just as one should tolerate the other’s efforts to carry out the rite of suspending a novice, so one should tolerate the suspension itself.

original: 'dir gzhung ni dge tshul bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed kyi zhu ba las dge 'dun gyis dge tshul bsnyil ba'i las kyis bsnyil bar gyur cing de yang 'byung bar bskyod na bzod par bgyi 'am /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni dge tshul bsnyil ba sdud pa'i ltung byed kyi zhu ba las dge 'dun gyis dge tshul bsnyil ba'i las kyis bsnyil bar gyur cing de yang 'byung bar bskyod na bzod par bgyi 'am /
translated: Here the text is the question in the downfalls that require confession alone of a novice who has been suspended, “If a novice has been suspended by the Saṅgha through the rite of suspending a novice, and he stirs up trouble, should it be tolerated?”

original: bzod par mi bgyi /
analyzed: bzod par mi bgyi /
translated: “Should it not be tolerated?”

original: bzod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bzod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “It should be tolerated.”

original: nan thur byed pa de dag gis ma bskos na nan thur byas pa la bzod pa mi 'chags so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nan thur byed pa de dag gis ma bskos na nan thur byas pa la bzod pa mi 'chags so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If those who are making the effort to carry out the suspension have not been appointed, then the confession of the suspension is not accepted.

original: nan thur byed pa'i dge slong rnams kyis nan thur byas pa'i gang zag de la bzod pa gyis shig ces ma bskos par dge slong gzhan gyis de la bzod pa len par byed pa mi 'chags pa ste /
analyzed: nan thur byed pa'i dge slong rnams kyis nan thur byas pa'i gang zag de la bzod pa gyis shig ces ma bskos par dge slong gzhan gyis de la bzod pa len par byed pa mi 'chags pa ste /
translated: A monk who is not appointed to exhort a person who is being exhorted by other monks to forgive should not exhort him to forgive.

original: gal te dge slong gzhan dag nan thur byas pa de la bzod pa byed 'dod na ci nas kyang nan thur byed pa dag gis der bskos pa nyid du 'gyur ba de ltar bya zhing de la bzod par bya'o //🔽bskrad pas sun phyung ba'i gnas su gnas par mi bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te dge slong gzhan dag nan thur byas pa de la bzod pa byed 'dod na ci nas kyang nan thur byed pa dag gis der bskos pa nyid du 'gyur ba de ltar bya zhing de la bzod par bya'o // bskrad pas sun phyung ba'i gnas su gnas par mi bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If other monks wish to exhort that person to forgive, they should act so that they themselves are appointed to do so by those who are exhorting him, and then they should exhort him to forgive.🔽One should not stay in a place where one has been expelled for having caused a lay person to lose faith.

original: khyim sun 'byin pa bskrad pa nyid kyi gnas gang sun phyung bar gyur pa'i spyod yul gyis gnas der des gnas par mi bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: khyim sun 'byin pa bskrad pa nyid kyi gnas gang sun phyung bar gyur pa'i spyod yul gyis gnas der des gnas par mi bya ba nyid de /
translated: One should not stay in a place where one has been expelled for having caused a lay person to lose faith.

original: des de dag ni ma dad pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: des de dag ni ma dad pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: One should go elsewhere in order to avoid causing others to lose faith.

original: 'dir gzhung ni rnam par 'byed pa las tshe dang ldan pa khyod gnas 'di nas song shig ces bya ba dang / dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las kyang bskrad pa zhes bya ba'i don ci lags nye ba 'khor las de'i ming yin te /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni rnam par 'byed pa las tshe dang ldan pa khyod gnas 'di nas song shig ces bya ba dang / dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las kyang bskrad pa zhes bya ba'i don ci lags nye ba 'khor las de'i ming yin te /
translated: Upali, it is a name for that action.

original: 'on kyang bskrad par bya ba ni dge slong khyim sun 'byin pa gang yin pa de la bya ste de 'dir gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //🔽gnas nas phyung ba thams cad la gnas par @298b bya ba ma yin pa nyid dang longs spyod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang bskrad par bya ba ni dge slong khyim sun 'byin pa gang yin pa de la bya ste de 'dir gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no // gnas nas phyung ba thams cad la gnas par @298b bya ba ma yin pa nyid dang longs spyod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: However, the monk who corrupts householders should be expelled, and he should not stay here.🔽All those expelled are not to stay and not to enjoy.

original: lhan cig gnas par bya ba nyid ma yin pa dang / lhan cig longs spyod pa ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba de gnyis ni gnas nas phyung ba thams cad la rig par bya'i /
analyzed: lhan cig gnas par bya ba nyid ma yin pa dang / lhan cig longs spyod pa ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba de gnyis ni gnas nas phyung ba thams cad la rig par bya'i /
translated: Those two, not to stay together and not to enjoy together, should be understood for all those expelled.

original: lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba nyid kyi gnas nas phyung ba 'ba' zhig la de gnyis rig par bya bar ma zad do //
analyzed: lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba nyid kyi gnas nas phyung ba 'ba' zhig la de gnyis rig par bya bar ma zad do //
translated: It is not only the expulsion of the one who does not give up wrong views that is to be known as both.

original: de yang bskrad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang bskrad par bya ba yin no //
translated: And that is to be expelled.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here is the text:

original: dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las gnas nas phyung ba grogs dang bcas par brjod par bgyi 'am /
analyzed: dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las gnas nas phyung ba grogs dang bcas par brjod par bgyi 'am /
translated: In the Sūtra Requested by the Bhikṣu Brahmā’s Son, it says, “Should expulsion be described as having companions or not?

original: grogs mchis par brjod par bgyi /
analyzed: grogs mchis par brjod par bgyi /
translated: Should it be described as having companions.

original: gnas nas phyung ba thams cad gcig pu grogs med pa gnyis pa med par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas nas phyung ba thams cad gcig pu grogs med pa gnyis pa med par brjod par bya'o //
translated: All expulsions should be described as solitary, without companions, without a second.

original: gnas nas phyung ba longs spyod dang bcas par brjod par bgyi'am /🔽longs spyod ma mchis par brjod par bgyi /
analyzed: gnas nas phyung ba longs spyod dang bcas par brjod par bgyi'am / longs spyod ma mchis par brjod par bgyi /
translated: Should expulsion be described as having enjoyments or not?🔽Should it be described as having enjoyments.

original: gnas nas phyung ba thams cad longs spyod med par brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //🔽'di la 'du shes kyi rnam par gzhag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas nas phyung ba thams cad longs spyod med par brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no // 'di la 'du shes kyi rnam par gzhag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: All expulsions should be described as without enjoyments.”🔽Here it is posited in terms of perception.

original: gnas nas phyung ba spang pa 'di la 'du shes kyi rnam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: gnas nas phyung ba spang pa 'di la 'du shes kyi rnam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: In this expulsion, which is abandonment, it is posited in terms of perception.

original: gang gis 'di gnas nas phyung ba yin no zhes bya bar shes la de mi spong ba de la nyes pa 'dir 'gyur gyi mi shes pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis 'di gnas nas phyung ba yin no zhes bya bar shes la de mi spong ba de la nyes pa 'dir 'gyur gyi mi shes pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: This fault would apply to one who knows that one has been expelled from the order but does not abandon him, not to one who does not know.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here is the text:

original: gang gis gnas nas phyung bar shes pa des lhan cig gnas pa dang / lhan cig longs spyod par mi bya'i /
analyzed: gang gis gnas nas phyung bar shes pa des lhan cig gnas pa dang / lhan cig longs spyod par mi bya'i /
translated: One who knows that one has been expelled from the order should not live with him or enjoy things with him.

original: gang gis gnas nas phyung bar mi shes pa dang lhan cig gnas pa dang lhan cig longs spyod pad dag la ni ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gis gnas nas phyung bar mi shes pa dang lhan cig gnas pa dang lhan cig longs spyod pad dag la ni ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: There is no offense for one who does not know that one has been expelled from the order, and who lives with him or enjoys things with him.

original: yongs su spang par bya ba thams cad yongs su spang ba dag la yang 'di'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam pa nyid rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su spang par bya ba thams cad yongs su spang ba dag la yang 'di'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam pa nyid rig par bya'o //
translated: And one should understand that this is the form of the offense for all the things that are to be abandoned.

original: bya ba nyid na de gnyis chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang cig shos su yin gyi cig shos dang ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bya ba nyid na de gnyis chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang cig shos su yin gyi cig shos dang ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: When one is doing it, those two are on the side of the Dharma and on the other side, but not on the other side.

original: las bye ba dang / 'khor lo bye ba dag las gang yang rung ba bye ba nyid na gnas par bya ba ma yin pa nyid dang longs spyad par bya ba ma yin pa nyid de gnyis chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang cig shos chos kyi phyogs su lhan cig mi bya ba
analyzed: las bye ba dang / 'khor lo bye ba dag las gang yang rung ba bye ba nyid na gnas par bya ba ma yin pa nyid dang longs spyad par bya ba ma yin pa nyid de gnyis chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang cig shos chos kyi phyogs su lhan cig mi bya ba
translated: The two, not to be done and not to be enjoyed, are not to be done together with the side of non-Dharma and the side of Dharma,

original: yin gyi / chos kyi phyogs cig shos dang chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su lhan cig byar mi rung ba ni ma yin te /🔽chos kyi phyogs la ni nyes pa med @299a * //
analyzed: yin gyi / chos kyi phyogs cig shos dang chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su lhan cig byar mi rung ba ni ma yin te / chos kyi phyogs la ni nyes pa med @299a * //
translated: but it is not that they are not to be done together with the side of Dharma and the side of non-Dharma.

original: pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no fault on the side of Dharma.

original: 'dir gzhung ni khas blangs pa dag khas ma blangs pa dag dang lhan cig longs spyod par byed na nyes byas so //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni khas blangs pa dag khas ma blangs pa dag dang lhan cig longs spyod par byed na nyes byas so //
translated: Here, the text says that if one enjoys together with those who have taken up the vows and those who have not taken up the vows, it is a misdeed.

original: khas ma blangs pa dag khas blangs pa dang lhan cig longs spyod par byed pa la ni lhung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: khas ma blangs pa dag khas blangs pa dang lhan cig longs spyod par byed pa la ni lhung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If one enjoys together with those who have not taken up the vows and those who have taken up the vows, there is no downfall.

original: nan thur byas pa gzhan dag la de gnyis mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nan thur byas pa gzhan dag la de gnyis mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The two are not to be done with others who are insistent.

original: gnas nas byung ba las gzhan pa'i nan thur byas pa bsdigs pa dang smad pa dang bskrad pa dang phyir 'gyed pa byas pa'i yul dag la lhan cig gnas par mi bya ba nyid dang lhan cig longs spyad par mi bya ba nyid de gnyis mi bya ba'o
analyzed: gnas nas byung ba las gzhan pa'i nan thur byas pa bsdigs pa dang smad pa dang bskrad pa dang phyir 'gyed pa byas pa'i yul dag la lhan cig gnas par mi bya ba nyid dang lhan cig longs spyad par mi bya ba nyid de gnyis mi bya ba'o
translated: One should not associate with or enjoy things with those who have been expelled, or with those who have committed other offenses such as threatening, disparaging, banishing or opposing.🔽Here the text states:

original: // 'dir gzhung ni bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la smad pa'i las bgyid na bgyis par brjod par bgyi'am /
analyzed: // 'dir gzhung ni bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la smad pa'i las bgyid na bgyis par brjod par bgyi'am /
translated: If one performs the act of disparaging after performing the act of threatening, should it be said that it is done?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavan said:

original: byas par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: byas par brjod par bya ste /
translated: It should be said that it is done.

original: bsdigs pa'i las ni bag yangs su gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: bsdigs pa'i las ni bag yangs su gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: The act of threatening is relaxed.🔽Thus, it is said that other offenses such as threatening are confessed in relation to other offenses such as banishment.

original: gnas nas phyung ba las gzhan pa'i nan thur byas pa dag la nan thur gzhan 'chags par gsungs nas gnas nas phyung ba la bsdigs pa'i las bgyid na bgyis par brjod par bgyi'am /
analyzed: gnas nas phyung ba las gzhan pa'i nan thur byas pa dag la nan thur gzhan 'chags par gsungs nas gnas nas phyung ba la bsdigs pa'i las bgyid na bgyis par brjod par bgyi'am /
translated: If one performs the act of threatening in relation to one who has been expelled, should it be said that it is done?

original: nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
translated: Upali, it should not be done.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni longs mi spyad par bya ba'i phyir song ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni longs mi spyad par bya ba'i phyir song ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he has gone forth in order to not enjoy those.

original: de bzhin du gnas nas phyung ba la smad pa dang bskrad pa dang phyir 'gyed pa'i las bgyid na bgyis par brjod par bgyi'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnas nas phyung ba la smad pa dang bskrad pa dang phyir 'gyed pa'i las bgyid na bgyis par brjod par bgyi'am /
translated: Similarly, if one performs the act of censure, banishment, or reconciliation against one who has been expelled, should it be said that it is done?

original: nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
translated: Upāli, it should not be done.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni longs mi spyad par bya ba'i phyir song ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni longs mi spyad par bya ba'i phyir song ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Because he has gone forth in order to not enjoy those.

original: de'i phyir mdo 'di byas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir mdo 'di byas so //
translated: Therefore, this sūtra was composed.

original: des 'grogs bshes la brten te gnas par bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: des 'grogs bshes la brten te gnas par bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should rely on a companion in order to live.

original: nan thur byas pa des 'grogs bshes la brten te gnas par bya ba nyid yin pa ste /
analyzed: nan thur byas pa des 'grogs bshes la brten te gnas par bya ba nyid yin pa ste /
translated: One should rely on a companion in order to live because of the hardship of that.

original: chad pa dang bcas pa nyid la yang de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chad pa dang bcas pa nyid la yang de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: This also applies to one who is subject to punishment.

original: 'dir gzhung ni mi gnas par 'dug par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa de'i don ci lags /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni mi gnas par 'dug par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa de'i don ci lags /
translated: Here the text states, “One should not live without a companion.” What is the meaning of that?

original: gang zag gang la la 'grogs bshes sam gus pa 'am ngo tsha shes pa'am yid du 'thad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par yod pa de la gnas te 'dug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i gzhung gnang ba yin no //
analyzed: gang zag gang la la 'grogs bshes sam gus pa 'am ngo tsha shes pa'am yid du 'thad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par yod pa de la gnas te 'dug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i gzhung gnang ba yin no //
translated: One should stay with and rely on any person with whom one is acquainted, who is a friend, who is respected, who is conscientious, or who is agreeable.

original: nan thur bya pas sam nyams pa bskrad par bya bas 'gyur ba brten na yo byad kyang phyung ste @299b dor ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nan thur bya pas sam nyams pa bskrad par bya bas 'gyur ba brten na yo byad kyang phyung ste @299b dor ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one is changed by being expelled or by being banished, one should give up one’s belongings.

original: dge slong gang la nan thur bya ba des sam /
analyzed: dge slong gang la nan thur bya ba des sam /
translated: If a monk is to be expelled,

original: tshul khrims 'chal pa nyams pa la bskrad par bya ba des dom zung dang khro bo la sogs par 'gyur ba bstan na de'i tshe de'i yo byad kyang phyung ste dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal pa nyams pa la bskrad par bya ba des dom zung dang khro bo la sogs par 'gyur ba bstan na de'i tshe de'i yo byad kyang phyung ste dor bar bya'o //
translated: or if a monk who has broken the precepts is to be banished, if he shows signs of anger, hatred, and so on, at that time one should give up one’s belongings.

original: mthus bskrad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mthus bskrad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should be expelled by force.

original: sngar bstan pa'i gang zag nan thur bya ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba de gnyis so //
analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i gang zag nan thur bya ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba de gnyis so //
translated: The two kinds of persons who are to be expelled are those who have been previously mentioned, namely, those who are to be expelled and those who have broken the precepts.

original: 'jus pa gcad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'jus pa gcad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should cut off his support.

original: gang zag de gnyis bskrad pa na ka ba la sogs pa gang la 'jus pa de yang gcad par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag de gnyis bskrad pa na ka ba la sogs pa gang la 'jus pa de yang gcad par bya'o //
translated: When those two persons are expelled, whatever they hold on to, such as a pillar, should be cut down.

original: de rdib ba'i chos ma yin na dbyung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de rdib ba'i chos ma yin na dbyung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is not the nature of that to fall down, it should be removed.

original: gang la 'jus pa gcad par bya ba de rdib par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin na dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang la 'jus pa gcad par bya ba de rdib par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin na dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: If whatever they hold on to, which should be cut down, is not the nature of that to fall down, it should be removed.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here is the text:

original: de la ka ba gcad par bya sgo skyes dbyung bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de la ka ba gcad par bya sgo skyes dbyung bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: In that case, a pillar should be cut down and a door should be removed.

original: de'i phyir mdo de gnyis byas so //🔽de dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir mdo de gnyis byas so // de dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, those two sutras were composed.🔽The Sangha corrects that.

original: bcad pa dang phyung ba de dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos par bya'i /
analyzed: bcad pa dang phyung ba de dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos par bya'i /

analyzed: gang gi phyir bcad pa dang phyung ba des ni ma yin no //

analyzed: dge slong 'thab krol byed pa gtsug lag khang nas bskrad pa dang / dge slong gzhan gyis phyir gzung par mi bya ba ste /

original: de ni phran tshegs dag las 'byung ngo //🔽'thab krol la 'bad pas ma log na nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /🔽'thab krol byed pa la bsdigs pas nyes par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni phran tshegs dag las 'byung ngo // 'thab krol la 'bad pas ma log na nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni / 'thab krol byed pa la bsdigs pas nyes par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is stated in the Kṣudraka-vinaya.🔽If one who is quarrelsome does not desist through effort, he should be expelled in order to pacify him.🔽If one who is quarrelsome does not desist through being threatened, he should be expelled in order to pacify him.

original: 'thab krol byed pa la bsdigs pas nye bar zhi bar bya ba brtsams shing 'bad pas 'thab krol ma log cing ma btang na nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //

translated: If one who is quarrelsome does not desist through being threatened, and if he does not desist through effort to pacify him, then the act of expelling him should be performed in order to pacify him.

original: yang dang yang du don gzhan dang gzhan gyi phyir 'thab krol skyed par byed pa nyid la ni bsdigs pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: yang dang yang du don gzhan dang gzhan gyi phyir 'thab krol skyed par byed pa nyid la ni bsdigs pa'i las bya'o //

original: mi gtong ba la ni gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya ste /
analyzed: mi gtong ba la ni gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya ste /

analyzed: de gnyis kyi yul gyi bye brag ni de yin no //

original: 'dir gzhung ni gleng gzhi dag las /🔽bcom @300a * //

analyzed: 'thab krol byed pa dag bzlog par bya'o //

analyzed: de dag mi bzlog pa na mi 'khod nas /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: gal te bzlog pa na mi 'khod na gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //

original: rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa las gyur pa la nye bar zhi bas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa las gyur pa la nye bar zhi bas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “By settling through resolution” means:

original: 'di ni 'di lta bu yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di lta bu yin no //

analyzed: 'di ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo nges par 'dzin pa ni rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa ste /

original: de las gyur pa'i 'thab krol 'og nas 'byung ba'i rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya bas mi ldog na nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
analyzed: de las gyur pa'i 'thab krol 'og nas 'byung ba'i rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya bas mi ldog na nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
translated: If the dispute that arises from that is not settled by the pacification of the dispute, then the act of expulsion should be done in order to settle it.

original: gnas pa la gnas kyis 'bad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas pa la gnas kyis 'bad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: slob ma dang nye gnas kyi rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa las gyur pa'i 'thab mo la mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis yal bar mi 'dor bar 'bad par bya ba ste /

analyzed: 'di ltar des gzhan la bcol bas 'bad par bya ba'am rang gis bya bas kyang rung ngo //

analyzed: 'thab krol gyi rgyu nye bar sgrub pa yang gnas nas dbyung bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The establishment of the cause of the dispute is also to be expelled means

original: mi gtong na zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: mi gtong na zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: that if the cause of the dispute is not given up,🔽then the act of expulsion should be done.

original: 'dir 'thab krol gyi rgyu zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dir 'thab krol gyi rgyu zhes bya ba ni /

original: 'dir 'dre zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dir 'dre zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: yang dang yang du sde zhing gnas pa ste /

analyzed: dge slong gre skyes lta bu'o //
