original: bsams bzhin du ma byas sam ci bar du gcod pa dang bcas par byas sam 'on te bar du chod pa med par byas /
analyzed: bsams bzhin du ma byas sam ci bar du gcod pa dang bcas par byas sam 'on te bar du chod pa med par byas /
translated: Why did you not do it intentionally? Did you do it with an obstacle or without an obstacle?

original: ci gnyid log pas byas sam /
analyzed: ci gnyid log pas byas sam /
translated: Did you do it while asleep or while awake?

original: 'on te gnyid ma log pas byas zhes de ltar las kyi ngo bo nyid spyir yid la snang bas yul la spyod pa'i skabs kyi dogs pa bstan te /
analyzed: 'on te gnyid ma log pas byas zhes de ltar las kyi ngo bo nyid spyir yid la snang bas yul la spyod pa'i skabs kyi dogs pa bstan te /
translated: Thus, the essence of the offense is generally made to appear in the mind.

original: de ltar byas sam ma byas ji zhig ji lta bu zhig ces dran par mi nus pa nyid de la yang 'chab pa mi 'byung ngo //🔽bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa nyid la ni dge 'dun lhag ma med pas de las yang 'chab pa mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar byas sam ma byas ji zhig ji lta bu zhig ces dran par mi nus pa nyid de la yang 'chab pa mi 'byung ngo // bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa nyid la ni dge 'dun lhag ma med pas de las yang 'chab pa mi 'byung ngo //
translated: If one is unable to remember whether one did it or not, or what it was, then concealment does not occur.🔽If one is not fully ordained, then one does not have the offense of a partially concordant act with negative commitments, so concealment does not occur.

original: gnas nas phyung ba nyid ni tha dad par gyur pa yin pas phyir bcos pa'i grogs med pa'i phyir de la yang 'chab pa mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gnas nas phyung ba nyid ni tha dad par gyur pa yin pas phyir bcos pa'i grogs med pa'i phyir de la yang 'chab pa mi 'byung ngo //
translated: If one is expelled from the community, then one is separated from the community and does not have companions who can restore one’s vows, so concealment does not occur.

original: tha snyad du rung ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid la ni pham par 'gyur ba man chad kyi ltung ba yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tha snyad du rung ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid la ni pham par 'gyur ba man chad kyi ltung ba yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And for one whose recognition of conventional usage is impaired, even the downfalls below the defeating offenses do not occur.

original: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa la sogs pa tha snyad du rung ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid la ni pham par 'gyur ba man chad kyi ltung ba yang mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa la sogs pa tha snyad du rung ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid la ni pham par 'gyur ba man chad kyi ltung ba yang mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: And for one whose recognition of conventional usage is impaired, even the downfalls below the defeating offenses do not occur.

original: man chad ces smos pas ni ltung ba thams cad mi 'byung bar bstan to //
analyzed: man chad ces smos pas ni ltung ba thams cad mi 'byung bar bstan to //
translated: The phrase and below indicates that all downfalls are not committed.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'chab pa yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar bstan to //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'chab pa yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar bstan to //
translated: The word also indicates that concealment does not occur.

original: ma bcabs pa nyid la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma bcabs pa nyid la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And for one who does not conceal,

original: de la pham par 'gyur ba man chad kyi ltung ba yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i rjes snyag pa'i phyir yang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra smos so //
analyzed: de la pham par 'gyur ba man chad kyi ltung ba yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i rjes snyag pa'i phyir yang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra smos so //
translated: The word also is used because it is a continuation of the statement, For one whose recognition of conventional usage is impaired, even the downfalls below the defeating offenses do not occur.

original: 'dir gzhung ni las dang po pa la ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni las dang po pa la ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here the treatise states that there is no downfall for a beginner.

original: mi shes pa nyid la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi shes pa nyid la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: But not if one is ignorant.

original: 'di ltung ba yin no zhes bya bar mi shes pa nyid la ni ltung ba mi 'byung ba ma yin te 'byung ba kho na yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltung ba yin no zhes bya bar mi shes pa nyid la ni ltung ba mi 'byung ba ma yin te 'byung ba kho na yin pa'o //
translated: But if one is ignorant, not knowing that this is a downfall, it is not that the downfall does not occur; it does occur.

original: 'dir gzhung ni tshe dang ldan pa de mi shes pas ni mi 'grol te /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni tshe dang ldan pa de mi shes pas ni mi 'grol te /
translated: Here the text says, “The venerable one does not go forth out of ignorance.

original: de la nyes pa gang byung ba de chos bzhin du byed du gzhug gi steng du zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de la nyes pa gang byung ba de chos bzhin du byed du gzhug gi steng du zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Whatever offense occurs there, one should make him act according to the Dharma.”

original: mngon par yid mi ches pa nyid la yang ngo zhes bya ba yang mi 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: mngon par yid mi ches pa nyid la yang ngo zhes bya ba yang mi 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: And “Also, if one does not believe it, it is not that the downfall does not occur.”

original: 'don pa dang brjod pa dag thos pa @306a * //🔽na 'di ltung ba yin no zhes bya bar mngon par yid mi ches pa nyid la yang ltung ba 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'don pa dang brjod pa dag thos pa @306a * // na 'di ltung ba yin no zhes bya bar mngon par yid mi ches pa nyid la yang ltung ba 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: When one hears the recitation and the expression of the downfall,🔽even if one does not believe that this is a downfall, the downfall will occur.

original: mngon par mi shes pa nyid du 'du shes pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba yang mi 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: mngon par mi shes pa nyid du 'du shes pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba yang mi 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: “Also, if one perceives oneself as ignorant, it is not that the downfall does not occur.”

original: 'don pa byed pa dang rjod par byed pa la 'di byis pa yin pas chung zad kyang smra ba ma yin no zhes de'i tshig dag la mi gus shing mngon par mi shes pa nyid du 'du shes pas ltung ba la yang mngon par yid mi ches pa
analyzed: 'don pa byed pa dang rjod par byed pa la 'di byis pa yin pas chung zad kyang smra ba ma yin no zhes de'i tshig dag la mi gus shing mngon par mi shes pa nyid du 'du shes pas ltung ba la yang mngon par yid mi ches pa
translated: They do not believe in downfalls,

original: nyid la yang ltung ba 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nyid la yang ltung ba 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: and they commit downfalls.

original: de dag ni ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de dag ni ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: These are not causes for not committing downfalls.

original: 'dir gzhung ni kun shes par 'dod pa'i dge slong gis kyang bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni kun shes par 'dod pa'i dge slong gis kyang bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here the text says, “A monk who wishes to understand should train in this training.”

original: sa gzhan na gnas pa nyid la ni snga ma yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa gzhan na gnas pa nyid la ni snga ma yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “and also the former” refers to those who are on other levels.

original: bsdigs pa dang smad pa dang bskrad pa dang / phyir 'gyed pa dang bslab pa byin pas gzhan na gnas pa nyid la ni snga ma zhes bya ba ltung ba 'byung ba kho na'o zhes bstan pa dag ni snga ma 'chab pa zhes bya ba yang mi 'byung ba ma yin te 'byung ba kho na yin pa'o
analyzed: bsdigs pa dang smad pa dang bskrad pa dang / phyir 'gyed pa dang bslab pa byin pas gzhan na gnas pa nyid la ni snga ma zhes bya ba ltung ba 'byung ba kho na'o zhes bstan pa dag ni snga ma 'chab pa zhes bya ba yang mi 'byung ba ma yin te 'byung ba kho na yin pa'o
translated: The former is taught to be the occurrence of downfalls alone, not the occurrence of concealment of the former.

original: // yang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ltung ba yang mi 'byung ba ma yin te 'byung ba kho na'o zhes bya ba ston te /
analyzed: // yang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ltung ba yang mi 'byung ba ma yin te 'byung ba kho na'o zhes bya ba ston te /
translated: The word also indicates that downfalls also occur, not that they do not occur.

original: de la 'chab pa dang ltung ba gnyis ka 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽'chab pa la dge 'dun lhag ma nyid la yid gnyis za ba ni shes pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la 'chab pa dang ltung ba gnyis ka 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // 'chab pa la dge 'dun lhag ma nyid la yid gnyis za ba ni shes pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That means both concealment and downfalls occur.🔽Doubt about partial defeat due to concealment is like knowledge.

original: yid gnyis ni 'du shes dang 'dra bar zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: yid gnyis ni 'du shes dang 'dra bar zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: Doubt is like discernment.

original: 'chab pa'i yul la dge 'dun lhag ma la yid gnyis za bzhin du bcabs na dge 'dun lhag mar shes bzhin du bcabs pa dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: 'chab pa'i yul la dge 'dun lhag ma la yid gnyis za bzhin du bcabs na dge 'dun lhag mar shes bzhin du bcabs pa dang 'dra ste /
translated: If one conceals a partial defeat while doubting whether it is a partial defeat, it is similar to concealing it while knowing it is a partial defeat.

original: 'chab pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'chab pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is said that one commits the fault of concealment.

original: sa gang la 'chab pa mi 'byung ba de la spyad pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa gang la 'chab pa mi 'byung ba de la spyad pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The level on which concealment does not occur is also the level on which the training is undertaken.

original: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang gnas nas phyung ba dang / tha snyad du byar rung ba'i 'du shes nyams pa zhes smos pa de dag ni 'dir yang zhes bya ba'i sgrar brjod de /
analyzed: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang gnas nas phyung ba dang / tha snyad du byar rung ba'i 'du shes nyams pa zhes smos pa de dag ni 'dir yang zhes bya ba'i sgrar brjod de /
translated: The phrase “those who are not fully ordained, those who have been ejected, and those whose faculties have degenerated” should be understood as referring to the phrase “those who are not fields for the training.

original: de dag ji ltar 'chab pa 'byung ba'i zhing ma yin pa de bzhin du yongs su gnas pa la sogs pa'i spyad pa'i zhing ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag ji ltar 'chab pa 'byung ba'i zhing ma yin pa de bzhin du yongs su gnas pa la sogs pa'i spyad pa'i zhing ma yin no //
translated: Just as they are not fields for the occurrence of concealment, they are not fields for the occurrence of the training of perfect conduct and so on.

original: ma gus pas spyod pa gtong na nyes byas so zhes @306b bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma gus pas spyod pa gtong na nyes byas so zhes @306b bya ba ni /
translated: If one abandons the training through disrespect, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba spyod pa ma gus pas gtong na nyes byas su 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba spyod pa ma gus pas gtong na nyes byas su 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If one abandons the training of perfect conduct and the training of pleasing conduct through disrespect, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: 'thab krol byed pa 'ong bas gtong ba la ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: 'thab krol byed pa 'ong bas gtong ba la ni nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if one gives it away because a dispute will ensue.

original: de la de'i sde pa lhag par spyod pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la de'i sde pa lhag par spyod pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In that, there is also the additional practice of that class.

original: yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba spyod pa'i gnas skabs de la de'i sde pa zhes bya ba dge 'dun lhag ma'i sde tshan du gtogs pa'i dngos gzhi 'am nyes pa sbom po 'am nyes byas lhag par spyod na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba spyod pa'i gnas skabs de la de'i sde pa zhes bya ba dge 'dun lhag ma'i sde tshan du gtogs pa'i dngos gzhi 'am nyes pa sbom po 'am nyes byas lhag par spyod na yang nyes byas su 'gyur ba'o //
translated: In that situation of fully abiding and practicing delight, if one engages in the additional practice of the basis of a partial defeat, a serious violation, or a minor offense that is included in the class of partial defeats, it is a minor offense.

original: yod la phyir mi 'chos na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yod la phyir mi 'chos na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one does not amend it, it is also so.

original: len par byed pa yod pa la sogs pas phyir 'chos pa'i thabs yod pa ltung ba phyir mi 'chos na skya rengs re re zhing nyes byas re rer 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: len par byed pa yod pa la sogs pas phyir 'chos pa'i thabs yod pa ltung ba phyir mi 'chos na skya rengs re re zhing nyes byas re rer 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If one does not amend a downfall that can be amended by confessing it and so on, one commits a minor offense for each day that one does not amend it.

original: mi spyod pa'i sa nas phyir 'ongs pa ni de'i gnas skabs nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi spyod pa'i sa nas phyir 'ongs pa ni de'i gnas skabs nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one returns from the stage of non-practice, it is that very situation.

original: yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba spyod pa'i gnas skabs bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang gnas nas phyung ba dang tha snyad rung ba'i 'du shes nyams pa yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba mi spyod pa'i sar song nas /
analyzed: yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba spyod pa'i gnas skabs bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang gnas nas phyung ba dang tha snyad rung ba'i 'du shes nyams pa yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba mi spyod pa'i sar song nas /
translated: The state of abiding and delighting is the state of full ordination, the state of being expelled from the order, and the state of having impaired the perception of what is proper.🔽The state of not delighting is the state of having gone to a place where one does not delight.

original: mi spyod pa'i sa de nas phyir 'ongs nas yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba spyod pa'i gnas skabs nyid yin pa ste /
analyzed: mi spyod pa'i sa de nas phyir 'ongs nas yongs su gnas pa dang mgu ba spyod pa'i gnas skabs nyid yin pa ste /
translated: The state of delighting is the state of having returned from that place where one does not delight.

original: ltung ba dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ltung ba dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The state of having a downfall is the state of having a downfall.🔽The basis of purification is the remainder to be accomplished.🔽The remainder to be accomplished is the confession of a downfall.

original: sbyang ba'i gzhi la lhag ma rjes su bsgrub po zhes bya ba ni /🔽bdag la ltung ba'i ming ni 'di byung /
analyzed: sbyang ba'i gzhi la lhag ma rjes su bsgrub po zhes bya ba ni / bdag la ltung ba'i ming ni 'di byung /
translated: The confession of a downfall is the confession of a downfall that has been committed.🔽The confession of a downfall that has been committed is the confession of a downfall that has been committed and concealed.🔽The confession of a downfall that has been committed and concealed is the confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, and not forgotten.🔽The confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, and not forgotten is the confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, not forgotten, and not recognized as a downfall.

original: rigs ni 'di byung /
analyzed: rigs ni 'di byung /
translated: The confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, not forgotten, and recognized as a downfall is the confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, not forgotten, recognized as a downfall, and not confessed.🔽The confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, not forgotten, recognized as a downfall, and not confessed is the confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, not forgotten, recognized as a downfall, and not confessed because of a wrong view.🔽The confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, not forgotten, recognized as a downfall, and not confessed because of a wrong view is the confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, not forgotten, recognized as a downfall, and not confessed because of a wrong view that is not abandoned.🔽The confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, not forgotten, recognized as a downfall, and not confessed because of a wrong view that is not abandoned is the confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, not forgotten, recognized as a downfall, and not confessed because of a wrong view that is not abandoned and not recognized as a wrong view.

original: dus ni 'di srid du bcabs pa'i mi bcabs pa de'i phyir bdag gis spyad pa 'di blangs te 'di srid ni spyad zin to //
analyzed: dus ni 'di srid du bcabs pa'i mi bcabs pa de'i phyir bdag gis spyad pa 'di blangs te 'di srid ni spyad zin to //
translated: The confession of a downfall that has been committed, concealed, not forgotten, recognized as a downfall, and not confessed because of a wrong view that is not abandoned and not recognized as a wrong view is the confession of a downfall that has

original: lhag ma ni 'di srid cig lus so zhes spyad pa gang la kun du spyad pa de brten par bya ba'i dge 'dun la brjod cing sbyangs pa'i gzhi la lhag ma ma spyad pa ji snyed yod pa bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: lhag ma ni 'di srid cig lus so zhes spyad pa gang la kun du spyad pa de brten par bya ba'i dge 'dun la brjod cing sbyangs pa'i gzhi la lhag ma ma spyad pa ji snyed yod pa bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: The remainder is what remains of the practice.🔽The person who has practiced a certain practice should declare it to the Saṅgha that supports the practice.🔽Whatever bases of training have not been practiced should be adopted.

original: de la lhag ma gang yod pa de spyad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la lhag ma gang yod pa de spyad par bya ba'o //
translated: Whatever remains should be practiced.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here is the text:

original: yongs su gnas par byed pa'i gang zag gis gzhi ji tsam sbyangs nas rnam par 'khyams te yang phyir 'ongs nas bsnyen par rdzogs na 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i nyes byas bshags te /
analyzed: yongs su gnas par byed pa'i gang zag gis gzhi ji tsam sbyangs nas rnam par 'khyams te yang phyir 'ongs nas bsnyen par rdzogs na 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i nyes byas bshags te /
translated: “If a person who is undergoing probation goes away after training in the bases for only a short time, and then returns and is fully ordained, he should confess the fault of the offense that is a downfall not entailing expulsion, which he has committed in violation of the training.

original: spo ba la yongs su gnas par gyur na /
analyzed: spo ba la yongs su gnas par gyur na /
translated: If he then completes the probation,

original: spo ba la yongs su gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: spo ba la yongs su gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: he will have completed the probation.”

original: bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi @307a * //
analyzed: bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi @307a * //
translated: If the time of the concealment is not certain,

original: shes na nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: shes na nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba la brten par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: he should rely on the shortest period.

original: ltung ba gang la bcabs pa'i dus nges pa nyid du mi shes te bdag gis ltung ba de dus 'di srid du bcabs so zhes bya bar bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes bde la ji nas kyang nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de srid cig🔽la brten par bya ba ste /
analyzed: ltung ba gang la bcabs pa'i dus nges pa nyid du mi shes te bdag gis ltung ba de dus 'di srid du bcabs so zhes bya bar bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes bde la ji nas kyang nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de srid cig la brten par bya ba ste /
translated: One should rely on the time for confessing a downfall for as long as it takes to avoid confessing it for too short a time.

original: ji nas kyang bcabs pa'i dus pas nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de srid cig la brten te /
analyzed: ji nas kyang bcabs pa'i dus pas nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de srid cig la brten te /
translated: One should rely on the time for confessing a downfall for as long as it takes to avoid confessing it for too short a time.

original: yongs su gnas par spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yongs su gnas par spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the phrase, one should practice for as long as it takes.

original: yul gang la nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de la brten par bya /
analyzed: yul gang la nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de la brten par bya /
translated: In what domain does one avoid confessing a downfall for too short a time?

original: dus de ni ji 'dra ba zhig ce na de'i phyir /
analyzed: dus de ni ji 'dra ba zhig ce na de'i phyir /
translated: What is that time like?

original: spyad par bya ba nyid la dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: spyad par bya ba nyid la dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: The time for confessing a downfall is the time for confessing a downfall that is qualified by the end of purification.🔽In what domain?

original: yul gang la zhe na spyad par bya ba nyid la'o //
analyzed: yul gang la zhe na spyad par bya ba nyid la'o //
translated: In the domain of the time for confessing a downfall.

original: dus de ji 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: dus de ji 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is that time like?

original: dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi dus te yul de la nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de lta bu brten par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi dus te yul de la nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus de lta bu brten par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The time is the specific time that ends in purity. One should rely on that time, which is not a short time for that object.

original: 'dir dus de don gnyis la brten te bcabs pa dang / spyad par bya ba nyid la'o //
analyzed: 'dir dus de don gnyis la brten te bcabs pa dang / spyad par bya ba nyid la'o //
translated: Here, time is based on two things: concealment and practice.

original: de la bcabs pa zhes bya ba ni dus 'di srid bcabs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de la bcabs pa zhes bya ba ni dus 'di srid bcabs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Regarding that, concealment is called concealment up to this time.

original: spyad par bya ba nyid ces bya ba ni dus 'di srid du yongs su gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyad par bya ba nyid ces bya ba ni dus 'di srid du yongs su gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Practice is called abiding for this long.

original: de la bcabs pa la ni yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba gnyi ga'i dus la brten to //
analyzed: de la bcabs pa la ni yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba gnyi ga'i dus la brten to //
translated: Regarding that, concealment is based on the time of both abiding and pleasing.

original: spyad par bya ba nyid la ni yongs su gnas pa'i dus 'ba' zhig la brten gyi /
analyzed: spyad par bya ba nyid la ni yongs su gnas pa'i dus 'ba' zhig la brten gyi /
translated: Practice is based only on the time of abiding,

original: mgu bar bya ba'i dus la ni mi brten te /
analyzed: mgu bar bya ba'i dus la ni mi brten te /
translated: but not on the time of pleasing.

original: 'di ltar mgu ba'i dus ni zhag drug kho nar nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mgu ba'i dus ni zhag drug kho nar nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the time of pleasing is definitely only six days.

original: de bas na 'dir bcabs pa'i dus des par me shes pas spyad par bya ba nyid kyi yul la brten par bya ste /
analyzed: de bas na 'dir bcabs pa'i dus des par me shes pas spyad par bya ba nyid kyi yul la brten par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, one should rely on the object that is to be practiced by one who has confessed that offense at that time.

original: yongs su gnas pa spyad par bya ba nyid kyi yul la'o //
analyzed: yongs su gnas pa spyad par bya ba nyid kyi yul la'o //
translated: One should rely on the object that is to be practiced by one who has fully remained in that state.

original: yul de la dus ji lta bu la brten par bya zhe na /🔽de'i phyir dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi dus la ste /
analyzed: yul de la dus ji lta bu la brten par bya zhe na / de'i phyir dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi dus la ste /
translated: At what time should one rely on that object?🔽Therefore, it is said, “at the time that ends with purity.”

original: dag pa zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa bcabs pa'i nyes pas mgos pa'i dus te /
analyzed: dag pa zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa bcabs pa'i nyes pas mgos pa'i dus te /
translated: Purity is the time of being without the fault of concealing a stainless offense.

original: sngon dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ma byung zhing ma bcabs pa nyid kyi dus so //
analyzed: sngon dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ma byung zhing ma bcabs pa nyid kyi dus so //
translated: It is the time of not having incurred and not concealing a partial defeat of the Saṅgha.

original: de'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni dag pa yang de nyid yin la mtha' yang de nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni dag pa yang de nyid yin la mtha' yang de nyid yin te /
translated: Its end is that which is both purity and its end.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ma byung zhing ma bcabs pa'i dus de'i mtha' dge @307b 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung zhing bcabs pa de'i snga rol kho na'i gnas skabs kyi dus so //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba ma byung zhing ma bcabs pa'i dus de'i mtha' dge @307b 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung zhing bcabs pa de'i snga rol kho na'i gnas skabs kyi dus so //
translated: The end of the time of not having incurred and not concealing a partial defeat of the Saṅgha is the time of having incurred and concealed a partial defeat of the Saṅgha. It is the period immediately before that.

original: mtha' can zhes bya ba ni yongs su gnas pa'i dus gang la dag pa'i mtha'i dus de yod pa de ni dag pa'i mtha' can te /
analyzed: mtha' can zhes bya ba ni yongs su gnas pa'i dus gang la dag pa'i mtha'i dus de yod pa de ni dag pa'i mtha' can te /
translated: The term “having an end” means that the time of abiding is the time of the end of purification.

original: bcabs pa'i dus des par mi shes pas yongs su gnas pa spyad par bya ba nyid brtsams pa de'i dang po'i khongs na sngon dge 'dun lhag ma ma byung gi bcabs pa'i nyes pas ma gos pa'i dus dag pa de'i mtha' yang yod pa la bya'o //
analyzed: bcabs pa'i dus des par mi shes pas yongs su gnas pa spyad par bya ba nyid brtsams pa de'i dang po'i khongs na sngon dge 'dun lhag ma ma byung gi bcabs pa'i nyes pas ma gos pa'i dus dag pa de'i mtha' yang yod pa la bya'o //
translated: Since the time of concealment is not known, the time of abiding is the time of the beginning of the practice of confession, which is the time of purity that is not tainted by the fault of concealment that occurred before the saṅgha’s downfall.

original: de'i bye brag gi zhes bya ba ni yongs su gnas par spyad pa'i dus kyi dang po dag pa'i mtha' can de'i bye brag gi dus te /
analyzed: de'i bye brag gi zhes bya ba ni yongs su gnas par spyad pa'i dus kyi dang po dag pa'i mtha' can de'i bye brag gi dus te /
translated: The term “its particular” means the time of the particular of the time of the end of purity, which is the time of the beginning of the practice of abiding.

original: dag pa'i dus kyi mtha' dang bcas pa de tshun chad nas bzung ste /
analyzed: dag pa'i dus kyi mtha' dang bcas pa de tshun chad nas bzung ste /
translated: The time of the end of the time of purity is the time of the beginning of the practice of abiding.

original: nam dge 'dun lhag ma byung ba bcabs par dran zhing mthol ba'i bar gyi dus zla ba bzhi la sogs pa ji srid du yongs su gnas pa spyad par bya ba nyid kyi dus la bya'o //
analyzed: nam dge 'dun lhag ma byung ba bcabs par dran zhing mthol ba'i bar gyi dus zla ba bzhi la sogs pa ji srid du yongs su gnas pa spyad par bya ba nyid kyi dus la bya'o //
translated: The time of the practice of abiding is the time from the beginning of the practice of abiding until the saṅgha’s downfall is remembered and confessed.

original: 'di skad bstan te bcabs ba'i dus des par mi shes pas yongs su gnas pa spyad par bya ba'i dus ni sngon yongs su dag pa'i dus kyi mtha' dang bcas pa nas bzung ste nam mthol ba'i bar gyi dus kyi bye brag de srid kyi bar du spyad
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te bcabs ba'i dus des par mi shes pas yongs su gnas pa spyad par bya ba'i dus ni sngon yongs su dag pa'i dus kyi mtha' dang bcas pa nas bzung ste nam mthol ba'i bar gyi dus kyi bye brag de srid kyi bar du spyad
translated: This is taught: Since the time of concealment is not known, the time of engaging in the period of purification is the time of engaging in the period of concealment, from the end of the time of complete purification up to the time of confession.

original: par bya'o // yongs su gnas pa spyad pa'i dus gang la dag pa'i dus kyi mtha' dang bcabs pa'i dus kyi bye brag zla ba bzhi la sogs pa yod pa de ni dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gis dus zhes bya ste /
analyzed: par bya'o // yongs su gnas pa spyad pa'i dus gang la dag pa'i dus kyi mtha' dang bcabs pa'i dus kyi bye brag zla ba bzhi la sogs pa yod pa de ni dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gis dus zhes bya ste /
translated: The time of engaging in the period of concealment is the time of engaging in the period of purification, which has the end of the time of purification and the time of concealment, such as four months, etc. That is called time by the distinction of having an end of purification.

original: bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pas yongs su gnas par spyad par bya ba nyid kyi yul la dus de lta bu la brten par bya'o //
analyzed: bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pas yongs su gnas par spyad par bya ba nyid kyi yul la dus de lta bu la brten par bya'o //
translated: Since the time of concealment is not ascertained, one should rely on such a time in the object of engaging in the period of concealment.

original: ji ltar nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi dus la brten par bya zhen de'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi dus la brten par bya zhen de'i phyir /
translated: How should one rely on the time of having an end of purification in order to not be too few?🔽Therefore, it is said:

original: dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi pa'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: dag pa'i mtha' can zla ba bzhi pa'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: The end of the purification is the four months.

original: sngar bye brag ces smos pa de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: sngar bye brag ces smos pa de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the distinction mentioned above?

original: zla ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar te /
analyzed: zla ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar te /
translated: It is connected with the four months.

original: dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi dus zla ba bzhi la brten bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi dus zla ba bzhi la brten bar bya ba'o //
translated: The distinction of the end of the purification is to be based on the four months.

original: zla ba bzhi zhes smos pas ni dpe ste nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi dus zla ba gsum mam lnga la sogs pa la brten par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba bzhi zhes smos pas ni dpe ste nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba dag pa'i mtha' can nyid kyi bye brag gi dus zla ba gsum mam lnga la sogs pa la brten par bya'o //
translated: The four months are mentioned as an example, so that it will not be thought that the period is too short. The distinction of the end of the purification is to be based on three or five months, etc.

original: dus de tsam zhig spyod na nges pa kho nar bcabs pa'i dus las nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur bar bsams nas dag pa'i mtha' can gyi bye brag zla ba @308a * //
analyzed: dus de tsam zhig spyod na nges pa kho nar bcabs pa'i dus las nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur bar bsams nas dag pa'i mtha' can gyi bye brag zla ba @308a * //
translated: If one practices for just that period of time, it is certain that the period of concealment will not be less than the time of the offense.

original: bzhi la sogs pa smos kyi /
analyzed: bzhi la sogs pa smos kyi /
translated: The distinction of the end of the purification is mentioned as four months, etc.,

original: spyad par bya ba'i dus de kho nar des pa nyid du bsams pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: spyad par bya ba'i dus de kho nar des pa nyid du bsams pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not thought that the period of practice is just that.

original: lhag pa la ni nyes pa med pas de'i phyir dag pa'i mtha' dang bcas te /
analyzed: lhag pa la ni nyes pa med pas de'i phyir dag pa'i mtha' dang bcas te /
translated: There is no fault in the remainder, therefore, one should rely on the pure limit.

original: bzung nas zla ba bzhi la sogs pa la brten par byas so //
analyzed: bzung nas zla ba bzhi la sogs pa la brten par byas so //
translated: Having grasped that, one should rely on four months, and so on.

original: 'o na bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pas nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus la brten par gang gsungs pa de la ci nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus yongs su chad pa zhig la brten par bya'am zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes pas nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus la brten par gang gsungs pa de la ci nyung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i dus yongs su chad pa zhig la brten par bya'am zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If one does not know the definite time of concealment, then one should rely on the time of non-decrease.

original: de'i phyir bcabs pa ni dpag tu med pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bcabs pa ni dpag tu med pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “Concealment is for an immeasurable time.”

original: brten par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: brten par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should rely on that, is what is meant.

original: bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes na bcabs pa'i phyir ni dus dpag tu med pa la brten par bya'o //
analyzed: bcabs pa'i dus nges par mi shes na bcabs pa'i phyir ni dus dpag tu med pa la brten par bya'o //
translated: If one does not know the definite time of concealment, then for the sake of concealment, one should rely on an immeasurable time.

original: ji ltar zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: How is that? Therefore it is said,

original: bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba dpag tu med par zhes so zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba dpag tu med par zhes so zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: “One should rely on an immeasurable time, arising from the emission of semen intentionally.”

original: bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la dus dpag tu med par bcabs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la dus dpag tu med par bcabs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase “arisen from emission of semen through intention” is applied to the offense of a partially concordant act of defeat that is concealed for an unlimited time.

original: sngags brjod pa'i skabs su bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la dus dpag tu med par bcabs pas zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags brjod pa'i skabs su bsams bzhin du khu ba phyung ba las byung ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung la dus dpag tu med par bcabs pas zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: In the context of reciting the confession, one should say “arisen from emission of semen through intention and concealed for an unlimited time.”

original: ci'i phyir 'dir yang zla ba bzhi bcabs pas zhes mi brjod ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'dir yang zla ba bzhi bcabs pas zhes mi brjod ce na /

analyzed: 'dzin pa las byung ba ni dgung gnyis bcabs pa nas /

translated: and to grant probation and rehabilitation, and

original: nye ba 'khor rung ste /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor rung ste /

translated: and to grant probation and rehabilitation,🔽and to declare that the actions were done and that the Saṅgha will not be in a position of conflict with the rule.”

original: dam pa dang rab tu dam pa dang / lci ba dang zhag mang du bcabs pa gang yin pa de'i phyir yongs su gnas pa dang gzhi nas yongs su @312b gnas pa dang / mgu bar bya ba dang gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin zhing dbyung bar bya ste /
analyzed: dam pa dang rab tu dam pa dang / lci ba dang zhag mang du bcabs pa gang yin pa de'i phyir yongs su gnas pa dang gzhi nas yongs su @312b gnas pa dang / mgu bar bya ba dang gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba sbyin zhing dbyung bar bya ste /
translated: Because of the grave and very grave offenses, and because of concealing them for many days, the penance and the basic penance are given, and the satisfaction and the basic satisfaction are given and the penance is imposed.

original: las de dag kyang byas par brjod par bya la /
analyzed: las de dag kyang byas par brjod par bya la /
translated: And those actions are said to be done,

original: des dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: des dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: and by that, there is no offense to the Saṅgha.

original: 'dir mngon par zhen pas byas pas ni dam pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dir mngon par zhen pas byas pas ni dam pa yin la /
translated: Here, the grave is done by manifest clinging.

original: mngon par zhen pa shas chen pos byas pa ni rab tu dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa shas chen pos byas pa ni rab tu dam pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The very grave is known to be done by strong manifest clinging.

original: spyod pa la sngon byung ba gzhan phyir gso bar 'dod pa skyes na tha dad par sbyin zhing cig car spyod do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: spyod pa la sngon byung ba gzhan phyir gso bar 'dod pa skyes na tha dad par sbyin zhing cig car spyod do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If the desire to restore the former conduct arises, the penance is given separately and the conduct is practiced simultaneously.

original: yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa'i gang zag la sngon ltung ba byung ba gzhan phyir gso bar 'dod pa skyes na ;
analyzed: yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa'i gang zag la sngon ltung ba byung ba gzhan phyir gso bar 'dod pa skyes na ;
translated: If a person who is observing the rite of restoration and the rite of pleasing has previously incurred a downfall and wishes to be restored,

original: de la ltung ba de'i yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa ni tha dad par sbyin par bya zhing spyad pa ni cig car spyad du rung ba ste /
analyzed: de la ltung ba de'i yongs su gnas pa dang mgu bar bya ba sbyin pa ni tha dad par sbyin par bya zhing spyad pa ni cig car spyad du rung ba ste /
translated: the rite of restoration and the rite of pleasing are to be performed separately, but the observance is to be performed together.

original: 'di la ltung ba gzhan yin pas spyad pa yang tha dad par spyad pa'i cho ga yin no snyam du bsam par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la ltung ba gzhan yin pas spyad pa yang tha dad par spyad pa'i cho ga yin no snyam du bsam par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not think, “Since this is a different downfall, the observance should be performed separately.”

original: de bcabs pa nyid yin na mgu bar bya ba la mi srid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bcabs pa nyid yin na mgu bar bya ba la mi srid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is concealed, it is impossible to perform the rite of pleasing.

original: cig car spyad pa de bcabs pa'i rgyu las yongs su gnas pa byed pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: cig car spyad pa de bcabs pa'i rgyu las yongs su gnas pa byed pa nyid yin na /
translated: If the observance is performed because of the cause of concealing the downfall,

original: mgu bar spyod pa dang yongs su gnas pa de cig car spyad pa de mi srid pa ste /
analyzed: mgu bar spyod pa dang yongs su gnas pa de cig car spyad pa de mi srid pa ste /
translated: it is impossible to perform the rite of pleasing and the rite of restoration together.

original: mgu bar bya ba ni sems mgu bar bya ba'i phyir yin la /
analyzed: mgu bar bya ba ni sems mgu bar bya ba'i phyir yin la /
translated: The rite of pleasing is performed in order to please the mind of the preceptor.

original: yongs su gnas pa bcabs pa ni kha na ma tho ba gzhom pa'i phyir yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su gnas pa bcabs pa ni kha na ma tho ba gzhom pa'i phyir yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Concealment of the basis is for the purpose of destroying that offense.

original: de bas na de gnyis cig car spyad pa ni mi srid do //
analyzed: de bas na de gnyis cig car spyad pa ni mi srid do //
translated: Therefore it is impossible to practice both simultaneously.

original: dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag de la ltung ba gnyi ga'i rgyud las snga ma la ni ji ltar bcabs pa'i spo ba byin cig / phyi mal ni zhag drug mgu bar bya ba byin cig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa des
analyzed: dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag de la ltung ba gnyi ga'i rgyud las snga ma la ni ji ltar bcabs pa'i spo ba byin cig / phyi mal ni zhag drug mgu bar bya ba byin cig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa des
translated: Monks, you should give the person who has two downfalls the trial period for the first offense as he concealed it and you should give him the trial period of six days for the second offense.

original: ni mgu bar spyod pa'i gnas skabs su yongs su gnas pa yang spyad pa de ltar bstan par shes par mi bya ste /
analyzed: ni mgu bar spyod pa'i gnas skabs su yongs su gnas pa yang spyad pa de ltar bstan par shes par mi bya ste /
translated: This passage does not teach that one should practice both the trial period and probation simultaneously.

original: de na phyir bcos pa tsam bstan pa yin pas der ni sngar bcabs pa'i phyir yongs su gnas pa byed du bcug pa de'i 'og tu dbyung ba'i phyir mgu ba byed du chug shig ces gsungs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de na phyir bcos pa tsam bstan pa yin pas der ni sngar bcabs pa'i phyir yongs su gnas pa byed du bcug pa de'i 'og tu dbyung ba'i phyir mgu ba byed du chug shig ces gsungs pa yin gyi /
translated: It teaches that since the trial period is a mere amendment, one should practice probation after the trial period for the first offense, since it was previously concealed.

original: mgu ba dang yongs su gnas pa gnyis cig car spyod du gzhug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mgu ba dang yongs su gnas pa gnyis cig car spyod du gzhug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that both satisfaction and complete restoration are to be undertaken simultaneously.

original: ci'i phyir gang zag gi gzhi la dus dang dus ma yin par bsdus pa 'byung ba'i gzhi zhes ming gzhan du byas she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gang zag gi gzhi la dus dang dus ma yin par bsdus pa 'byung ba'i gzhi zhes ming gzhan du byas she na /
translated: Why is the basis of the person called by another name, the basis of the occasion and the basis of the non-occasion?

original: don dang ldan par bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: don dang ldan par bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is taught for the sake of meaningfulness.

original: dus dang dus @313a * //🔽ma yin par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dus dang dus @313a * // ma yin par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The occasion and the non-occasion🔽are the occasion and the non-occasion for the arising of the basis.

original: 'di ni ltung ba bcabs pa spyad pa rnams kyi ldang ba'i dus so //
analyzed: 'di ni ltung ba bcabs pa spyad pa rnams kyi ldang ba'i dus so //
translated: This is the occasion for the arising of the basis of the person who has committed a concealed offense.

original: 'di ni dus ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di ni dus ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is not the occasion.

original: bsdus pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni /🔽ltung ba rnams kyi chog mdor bsdus pa 'dis cig car don gcig tu 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: bsdus pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni / ltung ba rnams kyi chog mdor bsdus pa 'dis cig car don gcig tu 'byung ba'o //
translated: The arising of the basis of the occasion and the non-occasion🔽is the arising of the basis of the occasion and the non-occasion.🔽The arising of the basis of the occasion and the non-occasion is the arising of the basis of the occasion and the non-occasion.

original: dus dang dus ma yin par bsdus pa 'byung ba'i gzhi'o zhes bya ba gang zag gi gzhi 'dul ba'i gzhi'i skabs su gtogs pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: dus dang dus ma yin par bsdus pa 'byung ba'i gzhi'o zhes bya ba gang zag gi gzhi 'dul ba'i gzhi'i skabs su gtogs pa bshad zin to //
translated: The basis of the person is included in the section on the basis of the Vinaya.

original: da ni dus dang dus ma yin par bsdus pa 'byung ba'i gzhi zhu ba'i skabs su brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni dus dang dus ma yin par bsdus pa 'byung ba'i gzhi zhu ba'i skabs su brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the time and nontime of the basis of the arising of concealment should be mentioned.

original: nyin mtshan gyi tha ma'i cha ma yin pa la 'chab pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyin mtshan gyi tha ma'i cha ma yin pa la 'chab pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Concealment does not arise in the last part of the day and night.

original: nyin mtshan gyi tha ma'i cha ma yin pa zhes bya ba skya rengs 'char ba'i skad cig gi mdun rol tshun chad de /
analyzed: nyin mtshan gyi tha ma'i cha ma yin pa zhes bya ba skya rengs 'char ba'i skad cig gi mdun rol tshun chad de /
translated: The last part of the day and night is the time before the moment of dawn.

original: de la 'chab pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la 'chab pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Concealment does not arise in that.

original: skya rengs shar na ni 'chab pa 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skya rengs shar na ni 'chab pa 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: When dawn has arisen, concealment definitely arises.

original: brjod pa'i yan lag med na de'i sems ma yin pa nyid 'chab pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: brjod pa'i yan lag med na de'i sems ma yin pa nyid 'chab pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If there is no branch of expression, then it is not concealment because it is not the mind.

original: brjod pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa rang bzhin du gnas pa dang / lta ba tha mi dad pa dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa dang / mtshan tha mi dad pa dang / mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de med na /
analyzed: brjod pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa rang bzhin du gnas pa dang / lta ba tha mi dad pa dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa dang / mtshan tha mi dad pa dang / mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de med na /
translated: The person who is a part of the expression, who is abiding in his nature, who has the same view, who is fully ordained, who has the same name, who is abiding within the boundary, and so on.

original: nyin mtshan gyi mtha' ma'i cha de la yang de'i sems ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba brjod pa de'i sems ma yin pa nyid yod kyang de la 'chab pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyin mtshan gyi mtha' ma'i cha de la yang de'i sems ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba brjod pa de'i sems ma yin pa nyid yod kyang de la 'chab pa ma yin no //
translated: If that person does not exist, then even in the final part of the day and night, it is said that “his mind is not present.” Even though his mind is not present, it is not concealment.

original: brjod pa'i yan lag yod la gal te mi brjod do snyam du mi brjod pa'i bsam pa skyed na /
analyzed: brjod pa'i yan lag yod la gal te mi brjod do snyam du mi brjod pa'i bsam pa skyed na /
translated: If the part of the expression exists, but he thinks “I will not express it,” and he generates the thought of non-expression,

original: de'i tshe 'chab pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'chab pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: at that time it is only concealment.

translated: Those two, the one who is sent away and the one who is satisfied, should not go to the houses of the laypeople following after the monk who is living in his natural state.

original: gnas sbyin par mi bya /

analyzed: spyi bungs bsham ban gand'i brdung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: They should beat the gandi to assemble the community.

original: 'bras chan la sogs pa'i spyi bungs 'ongs shing bshams zin pa ni de gnyis kyis gand'i brdung bar bya ba'o //🔽gal te dge slong rnams tshan bsil yab bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'bras chan la sogs pa'i spyi bungs 'ongs shing bshams zin pa ni de gnyis kyis gand'i brdung bar bya ba'o // gal te dge slong rnams tshan bsil yab bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: When the community has gathered and the rice and so forth have been prepared, those two should beat the gandi.🔽If the monks are hot, they should fan them with yak-tail fans.

original: gal te dge slong rnams tsha bar gyur na de gnyis kyis bsil yab kyis g-yab par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te dge slong rnams tsha bar gyur na de gnyis kyis bsil yab kyis g-yab par bya ba'o //
translated: If the monks are hot, those two should fan them with yak-tail fans.

original: de dag gis 'dug pa la sogs pa ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa thams cad kyi mtha' nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag gis 'dug pa la sogs pa ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa thams cad kyi mtha' nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase the end of all full ordination refers to sitting, etc.

original: de gnyis kyis 'dug pa la sogs ba ni bsnyen bar rdzogs pa thams cad kyi mtha' nyid yin pa ste /
analyzed: de gnyis kyis 'dug pa la sogs ba ni bsnyen bar rdzogs pa thams cad kyi mtha' nyid yin pa ste /
translated: The end of all full ordination refers to sitting, etc.

original: de ni gral rims bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni gral rims bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is taught in order to show the order of the rows.

original: dge slong gi gral der thams cad kyi tha mar 'dug pa dang 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o //🔽zas kyi bya ba byas nas gdan cha dben par brtul lo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge slong gi gral der thams cad kyi tha mar 'dug pa dang 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o // zas kyi bya ba byas nas gdan cha dben par brtul lo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should sit, walk, etc., at the very end of all the monks.🔽After the meal is finished, the seats of the Saṅgha should be gathered in a secluded place.

original: dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas zin nas dge 'dun gyi gdan cha dbyam po dang gor bu dang bar tang la sogs pa dag dben pa'i gnas su bsdu bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas zin nas dge 'dun gyi gdan cha dbyam po dang gor bu dang bar tang la sogs pa dag dben pa'i gnas su bsdu bar bya ba'o //
translated: After the monks have finished the meal, the seats of the Saṅgha, the mats, the cushions, etc., should be gathered in a secluded place.

original: lhung bzed kyi gzhi dor ro zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: lhung bzed kyi gzhi dor ro zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The base of the alms bowl should be discarded.

original: lhung bzed kyi gzhi rtsva la sogs pa de dag nyid kyis phyi rol du dor bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhung bzed kyi gzhi rtsva la sogs pa de dag nyid kyis phyi rol du dor bar bya ba'o //
translated: The base of the alms bowl, the grass, etc., should be discarded outside.

original: dus shes par bya ste mchod rten gyi phyag dar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dus shes par bya ste mchod rten gyi phyag dar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should know the time and sweep the stupa.

original: mchod pa'i dus shes par byas te'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i dus shes par byas te'o //
translated: One should know the time for worship.

original: lcib 'jam po'i byug pas bsku'o zhes bya ba ni mchod rten dag la'o //🔽'du ba'i dus su bsham pa la sogs pa nas yon tan gyi skabs kyi bar dag go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lcib 'jam po'i byug pas bsku'o zhes bya ba ni mchod rten dag la'o // 'du ba'i dus su bsham pa la sogs pa nas yon tan gyi skabs kyi bar dag go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should anoint with soft, fragrant unguent.🔽One should set out the seats, etc. up to the occasion of the virtues, at the time of the assembly of the Sangha.

original: dge 'dun 'du ba'i dus su yang stan bsham pa nas ston pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsgrag pa'i bar dag bya ba ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'du ba'i dus su yang stan bsham pa nas ston pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsgrag pa'i bar dag bya ba ste /
translated: One should set out the seats, etc. up to the proclamation of the virtues of the Teacher, at the time of the assembly of the Sangha.

original: sngar stan bsham mo //
analyzed: sngar stan bsham mo //
translated: One should set out the seats beforehand.

original: dus shes par bya ste /
analyzed: dus shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know the time.

original: bdug spos dang de'i pog phor dag nye bar gzhag go //
analyzed: bdug spos dang de'i pog phor dag nye bar gzhag go //
translated: One should place incense and the incense burner nearby.

original: gal te nus pa nyid yin na ston pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsgrag go //
analyzed: gal te nus pa nyid yin na ston pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsgrag go //
translated: If one is able, one should proclaim the virtues of the Teacher.🔽If one is not able, one should request someone else to do it.

original: gal te mi nus na smra ba po la bcol lo zhes ji skad bstan pa de dag bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gal te mi nus na smra ba po la bcol lo zhes ji skad bstan pa de dag bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: One should do what has been taught.

original: gal te nus pa nyid yin na nyi ma brjod pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te nus pa nyid yin na nyi ma brjod pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is possible, then the sun should be announced.

original: gal te nus pa nyid yin na de gnyis kyis nyi ma brjod pa yang bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te nus pa nyid yin na de gnyis kyis nyi ma brjod pa yang bya ba'o //
translated: If it is possible, then the sun should be announced by those two.

original: gal te mi nus na dge slong gzhan la bcol lo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te mi nus na dge slong gzhan la bcol lo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is not possible, then it should be entrusted to another monk.

original: gal te nyi ma brjod bar mi nus na de gnyis kyis dge slong gzhan la bcol bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te nyi ma brjod bar mi nus na de gnyis kyis dge slong gzhan la bcol bar bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not possible to announce the sun, then it should be entrusted to another monk by those two.

original: dgongs @317a * //
analyzed: dgongs @317a * //
translated: In the evening,

original: kar dus dang mthun pa'i chus dge slong rnams kyi rkang pa bkru'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kar dus dang mthun pa'i chus dge slong rnams kyi rkang pa bkru'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: the feet of the monks should be washed with water that is suitable for the time.

original: mtshan mo dus dang mthun pa'i chu zhes bya ba grang ba'i dus su ni dro ba /
analyzed: mtshan mo dus dang mthun pa'i chu zhes bya ba grang ba'i dus su ni dro ba /
translated: At night, water that is suitable for the time means, in a cold time, warm;

original: tsha ba'i dus su ni bsil ba'i dge slong rnams kyi rkang pa dag par bkru pa'o //
analyzed: tsha ba'i dus su ni bsil ba'i dge slong rnams kyi rkang pa dag par bkru pa'o //
translated: in a hot time, cool. The feet of the monks should be washed well.

original: rkang pa dag bsku'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rkang pa dag bsku'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The feet should be massaged.

original: dgongs kar dge slong rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: dgongs kar dge slong rnams kyi'o //
translated: In the evening, the feet of the monks should be massaged.

original: mi 'dod na snum dbul lo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi 'dod na snum dbul lo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If they do not want it, oil should be given.

original: dge slong dag rkang pa bsku bar mi 'dod na snum dbul bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: dge slong dag rkang pa bsku bar mi 'dod na snum dbul bar bya ba'o //
translated: Monks who do not want to anoint their feet should be given oil.

original: de ni gtsug lag khang tha mar 'os pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni gtsug lag khang tha mar 'os pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the proper order for the monastery.

original: spang dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa de'i gnas khang la sogs pa gtsug lag khang bsnyen par rdzogs pa thams cad kye tha mar bsko bar bya ba nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: spang dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa de'i gnas khang la sogs pa gtsug lag khang bsnyen par rdzogs pa thams cad kye tha mar bsko bar bya ba nyid yin pa'o //
translated: The dwelling place of that monk who is practicing the purification by pleasing is the last to be assigned among all the monasteries of the fully ordained.

original: spo ba byed pa la sogs pa nang ni che rim gyis bsko ste /
analyzed: spo ba byed pa la sogs pa nang ni che rim gyis bsko ste /
translated: The one who is being sent back and so on is appointed in order of seniority.

original: mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dag pas spo ba tha ma nyid yin no //
analyzed: mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dag pas spo ba tha ma nyid yin no //
translated: The one who is practicing the purification by pleasing is the last to be sent back.

original: spo ba dag pas bslab pa byin pa tha ma nyid yin te /
analyzed: spo ba dag pas bslab pa byin pa tha ma nyid yin te /
translated: The one who is practicing the purification by giving the training is the last to be given the training.

original: ltung ba byung ba ches dman ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltung ba byung ba ches dman ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the downfall that has occurred is the least.

original: thams cad bas gnas nas phyung ba dag tha ma nyid yin te spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad bas gnas nas phyung ba dag tha ma nyid yin te spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The one who is expelled from the monastery is the last of all, because he is abandoned.

original: thams cad du rnyed pa dbang ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thams cad du rnyed pa dbang ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He has the right to receive all the property.

original: gnas nas phyung ba ma gtogs pas gzhan na gnas na de dag go //
analyzed: gnas nas phyung ba ma gtogs pas gzhan na gnas na de dag go //
translated: They are not expelled from the order, but they are not allowed to stay in the monastery.

original: dge ba'i phyogs la mi g-yel bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge ba'i phyogs la mi g-yel bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not be remiss in the practice of virtue.

original: de dag dge ba'i phyogs kyi dus ma yin par shes par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de dag dge ba'i phyogs kyi dus ma yin par shes par mi bya ste /
translated: One should not think that the time for the practice of virtue has not yet come.

original: 'di ltar de de'i dus na rtogs pa'i skal ba can ma yin du zin kyang de lta mod kyi tshogs rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba'i phyogs la mi g-yel bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar de de'i dus na rtogs pa'i skal ba can ma yin du zin kyang de lta mod kyi tshogs rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba'i phyogs la mi g-yel bar bya'o //
translated: Even though one is not yet capable of understanding the truth, still one should not be remiss in the practice of virtue, in order to accumulate the equipment.

original: nam zhig na rtogs pa'i skal ba can du yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: nam zhig na rtogs pa'i skal ba can du yang 'gyur te /
translated: When will one become capable of understanding the truth?

original: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam pas ltung ba las ldang bar smra'i /
analyzed: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam pas ltung ba las ldang bar smra'i /
translated: The Lord has said that one rises from a downfall through reflection,

original: chad pa'i las kyis ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chad pa'i las kyis ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but not through the performance of a ritual.

original: bslab pa byin pa la yang rtogs pa grag pas des na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa na spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa de gnyis kyang bslab pa byin pa dang 'dra bar rang bzhin thob cing chad pa'i las lhag ma spyad par bya mi
analyzed: bslab pa byin pa la yang rtogs pa grag pas des na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa na spo ba dang mgu bar bya ba spyod pa de gnyis kyang bslab pa byin pa dang 'dra bar rang bzhin thob cing chad pa'i las lhag ma spyad par bya mi
translated: Also, it is said that when one obtains arhatship, the two activities of shifting and pleasing are similar to the bestowal of training and are obtained by nature.🔽

original: dgos pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: dgos pa nyid yin te /
translated: Also, it is well known that when one obtains arhatship, one is given the nature of the two modes of conduct of probation and restoration, which are similar to the nature of one who is given the essence and one who is given training.🔽One does not need to engage in the remaining acts of demotion.

original: dbyung ba la sogs pa bya mi dgos so //
analyzed: dbyung ba la sogs pa bya mi dgos so //
translated: One does not need to engage in the acts of banishment and so on.

original: 'di ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa dang bslab pa byin pa dag kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni /🔽dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa las mngon par smra ba la sogs pa dag bdag @317b gir mi bya'o zhes ji skad bstan pa'i spyod pa 'di la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa dang bslab pa byin pa dag kyang spo ba dang mgu bar bya
analyzed: 'di ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa dang bslab pa byin pa dag kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni / dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa las mngon par smra ba la sogs pa dag bdag @317b gir mi bya'o zhes ji skad bstan pa'i spyod pa 'di la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa dang bslab pa byin pa dag kyang spo ba dang mgu bar bya
translated: The search for the essence of one who is given the essence and one who is given training is similar to that.🔽This is the search for the essence of one who is given the essence and one who is given training.

original: ba spyod pa de dang 'dra ste de gnyis kyi spyod pa yang 'di dag nyid yin no //
analyzed: ba spyod pa de dang 'dra ste de gnyis kyi spyod pa yang 'di dag nyid yin no //
translated: The search for the essence of one who is given the essence and one who is given training is similar to that.

original: gdon par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gdon par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not recite it.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa dang bslab pa byin pa de gnyis kyis 'don pa gzhan med na yang gso spyod la so sor thar pa gdon par mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa dang bslab pa byin pa de gnyis kyis 'don pa gzhan med na yang gso spyod la so sor thar pa gdon par mi bya ba'o //
translated: One should not recite the Pratimoksa of the Bhikṣus and Bhikṣuṇīs in the Poṣadha ceremony if there is no other reciter.

original: snga ma ni bzod pa gsol bas rang bzhin 'thob po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: snga ma ni bzod pa gsol bas rang bzhin 'thob po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The first is the natural state, through requesting forgiveness.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa dang bslab pa byin pa zhes bya ba gnyis smos pa'i snga ma ste /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa dang bslab pa byin pa zhes bya ba gnyis smos pa'i snga ma ste /
translated: The first of the two mentioned, the one who seeks the essence, is the one who requests forgiveness.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa ni rang gis dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol zhing dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzod pa byas na rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid 'thob bo //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid tshol ba byin pa ni rang gis dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol zhing dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzod pa byas na rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid 'thob bo //
translated: The one who seeks the essence requests forgiveness from the Saṅgha, and if forgiveness is granted by the Saṅgha through the four-announcement ceremony, he regains the natural state.

original: rang gi bzod pa gsol ba'i sngags ni /
analyzed: rang gi bzod pa gsol ba'i sngags ni /
translated: The mantra for requesting forgiveness is:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol //
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol //
translated: Venerable Saṅgha, please listen!

original: bdag dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba la /
analyzed: bdag dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba la /
translated: I, the monk Udayī, who is seeking the essence,

original: skra 'greng bar gyur /
analyzed: skra 'greng bar gyur /
translated: have my hair standing on end.

original: skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid /
analyzed: skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid /
translated: He has disheveled hair, and he has been pulling out his hair and beard in the midst of the Saṅgha.

original: 'byung bar bskyod /
analyzed: 'byung bar bskyod /
translated: He has been shaking,

original: mtshungs par nye bar ston cing mtshams kyi nang du mchis te /
analyzed: mtshungs par nye bar ston cing mtshams kyi nang du mchis te /
translated: and he has been acting like a madman in the midst of the Saṅgha.

original: bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las sma dbab pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar ldog na /
analyzed: bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las sma dbab pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar ldog na /
translated: If he turns back from the basis on account of which the Saṅgha has performed the action of condemning him,

original: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste /
translated: then may the reverend Saṅgha, out of compassion,

original: bdag dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba la bzod pa mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: bdag dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba la bzod pa mdzad du gsol //
translated: grant the monk Udayī forbearance for his essential nature.

original: lan gsum bzlas zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: lan gsum bzlas zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is to be repeated three times.

original: dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzod pa bya ba'i sngags ni /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzod pa bya ba'i sngags ni /
translated: The mantra for granting forbearance by means of a formal act consisting of one motion and three proclamations by the Saṅgha is as follows:

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol //
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol //
translated: “May the reverend Saṅgha listen to me!

original: dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba 'di skra 'greng bar gyur /
analyzed: dge slong 'char ka de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal ba 'di skra 'greng bar gyur /
translated: The monk Udayī, who has been sent away to seek his essential nature, has disheveled hair,

original: skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid /
analyzed: skra 'phyar bar gyur cing dge 'dun la spu snyol bar bgyid /
translated: and he has been pulling out his hair and beard in the midst of the Saṅgha.

original: 'byung bar bskyod /
analyzed: 'byung bar bskyod /
translated: He is to be expelled.

original: mtshungs bas nye bar ston cing mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las sma dbab pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar ldog na /
analyzed: mtshungs bas nye bar ston cing mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol zhing gzhi gang las sma dbab pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i gzhi de las slar ldog na /
translated: If he returns to the basis from which he was expelled,

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka di'i ngo bo nyid du tshol du stsal ba la bzod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong 'char ka di'i ngo bo nyid du tshol du stsal ba la bzod pa mdzad do //
translated: if the Saṅgha judges the time to be right and forbears, let the Saṅgha grant its permission. The Saṅgha forbears the monk Udāyin’s natural state.

original: 'di @318a * //🔽ni gsol pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di @318a * // ni gsol pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is the motion.

original: 'og ma ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'og ma ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The next is by means of arhatship.

original: bslab pa byin pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bslab pa byin pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The granting of training” means

original: bzod pas rang bzhin mi 'thob kyi dgra bcom pa nyid thob pas rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bzod pas rang bzhin mi 'thob kyi dgra bcom pa nyid thob pas rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: that by means of forbearance, one does not obtain the natural state, but by means of obtaining arhatship, one obtains the natural state.

original: sgo dbye ba yan chad dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa la yongs su gnas pa dang ldan pa dang spyod pa dang ldan pa dang gnyis kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sgo dbye ba yan chad dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa la yongs su gnas pa dang ldan pa dang spyod pa dang ldan pa dang gnyis kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The consecration of the door and so on, the consecration of the temple and so forth, and the consecration of the conduct are the two.
